Product Name: Legendary Wheel Co. Shelby Magstar Alloy Wheel 15"X7" Black/Machined 1965-1973
Description:
One major way to change the appearance of a Mustang has always been to change the wheels. This Legendary Wheel Co. Black and Machined 15" x 7" Shelby Magstar Alloy Wheel from CJ Pony Parts will give your classic 1965-1973 Mustang a sportier style that will turn heads no matter where you go!

If this Magstar wheel looks familiar, that is because Legendary Wheel Co. has designed it as a modern interpretation of the classic Kelsey Hayes wheel originally found on the 1967 Shelby Mustangs. With a one-piece cast aluminum construction, this wheel features a five spoke design with CNC machined face, black accents and a durable clear coat finish. The one-piece design allows for tremendous weight savings over the original steel design. This lighter weight will improve acceleration and breaking performance for your Mustang.

These Legendary Wheel Co. Black and Machined 15" x 7" Shelby Magstar Alloy Wheels LW30-50754A are available individually or as a complete set of four (4).

Wheel Information:
- Size: 15" x 7"
- Lugs: 5 x 4.5"
- Finish: Machined with Black Inserts
- Backspacing: 4.25"
- Weight: 16lbs
- Center Cap: Included

Please Note: Legendary Wheel Co. "L" logo Center caps are included with the Legendary Wheel Co. wheels.  Original style center caps with Ford licensed logos are sold separately. Lug nuts are not included, CJ Pony Parts carries the correct lug nuts for installation of Legendary Wheel Co. wheels.

Tech Tip: This wheel is designed to fit most 5-lug 1965-1973 Mustangs with the original 5 x 4.5" bolt pattern and 4.25" of backspacing. However as a general rule of thumb, you should always measure and verify clearance before ordering aftermarket wheels, as modifications may, or will be necessary for fitment.

*For 1965-1966 Mustangs, 215/60-15 tires are recommended with 15x7” wheels but will require modifications for correct fit.
*For 1967-1968 Mustangs, 225/60-15 tires are recommended with 15x7” wheels.
*For 1969-1973 Mustangs, 235/60-15 tires are recommended with 15x7” wheels.

Legendary Wheel Co. produces premium-quality, one-piece cast aluminum wheels which have established the new standard of classic Mustang styling at an affordable price. CJ Pony Parts offers many wheel and center cap options from Legendary Wheel Co. so you can turn your Mustang into a one-of-a-kind car that will draw plenty of attention anywhere you drive it.

Order this Legendary Wheel Co. LW30-50754A Black and Machined 15" x 7" Shelby Magstar Alloy Wheel for your 1965, 1966, 1967, 1968, 1969, 1970, 1971, 1972 or 1973 Mustang from CJ Pony Parts today!

Product Name: FOOSE Legend Wheel 18"x9" Gloss Black with Machined Lip 1965-1973
Garage Friendly Name: Legend - Gloss Black with Machined Lip
Description:
Update your classic Mustang with 18" x 9" FOOSE Legend wheels. FOOSE Legend wheels are reminiscent of Bullitt style wheels with a new twist. Five rounded spokes extend to the barrel of the wheel. Spokes are recessed from the edge of the wheel leaving an undefined lip. A gloss black finish creates a stealthy look that will compliment any Mustang no matter what the color or theme. The outer edge of the wheel features a machined groove, about 1/2" wide, to add an accent to the wheel. A black FOOSE center cap completes the look of the Legend wheel. With a large diameter and wide open style, the FOOSE Legend wheel shows off brakes very well. The 18" x 9" wheel is meant to fit the rear of the Mustang to create a staggered setup.

Wheel Information
Size: 18" x 9"
Lugs: 5-Lug
Finish: Gloss Black with Machined Lip
Backspacing: 5.25"
Center Cap: Included

This FOOSE wheel requires small diameter, tuner style lug nuts (WHLLN7 and WHLLN8). Larger OEM style lug nuts will NOT work.

Available individually, as a staggered set of four wheels or a set with tires.

FOOSE wheels are designed by legendary hotrod designer Chip Foose. With custom updated wheel designs, Chip Foose is able to bring hot rod styling to your classic Pony. You don't need an expensive hot rod to rock a set of unmistakable FOOSE wheels though. High quality cast 18" x 9" wheels add style to your Mustang at an affordable price. We offer plenty of options so you can turn your Mustang into a one-of-a-kind car that draws all the attention at car shows. Chip Foose has a history of building hot rods and the experience to design wheels that will compliment any Mustang.

Please Note: This wheel is designed to fit the rear of most 5-lug 1965-1973 Mustangs with the correct 5 x 4.5" bolt pattern and backspacing size. However, the aggressive diameter and width of the wheel is far larger than any factory wheel found on 1965-1973 Mustangs. Please check fitment before ordering, as modifications may, or will be necessary.

*The staggered set of wheels comes with 18" x 8" front wheels with a 4.5" offset.

One of the easiest ways to get the biggest visual impact from an upgrade to your 1965-1973 Mustang is by adding some new wheels from CJ Pony Parts. If you want to stray away from common replica style wheels, FOOSE Wheels offers a variety of styles so your Mustang can be one of a kind. With the addition of matching tires, your Mustang can look amazing in no time!
Short Description: FOOSE 18" x 9" Gloss Black Legend Wheel with a Machined Lip for 1965, 1966, 1967, 1968, 1969, 1970, 1971, 1972 and 1973 Mustangs.

Product Name: AWE Cat-Back Exhaust System Touring Edition With 4" Black Tips Without Factory Active Exhaust GT Fastback 2018-2022
Description:
Give your 2018-2022 GT Fastback Mustang a smooth exhaust note with no drone with this AWE Touring Edition Cat-Back Exhaust System with 4" Black Tips that’s now available at CJ Pony Parts! 

Features & Benefits:
- AWE’s Proprietary Sound Cancellation Solution: 180 Technology
- Enables Perfect Tone, Minus Drove, to Deliver Ultimate Mix of Performance and Sophistication
- Delivers Civil, Smooth Sound throughout Range and Enhanced In-Cabin Driving Experience
- All the Muscle with ZERO Drone
- Proudly Engineered, Designed and Manufactured in the USA
- 3" Diameter CNC Mandrel-Bent Piping
- 4" Double-Walled Slash Cut Quad Tips in Diamond Black
- Clean, Non-Baffled, Straight-Through Design Maximizes Performance
- H-Pipe with Two Bullet-Style Resonators
- Handcrafted from U.S.-Sourced .065” Wall T304L Stainless Steel
- Direct Bolt-On System for Factory-Like Simplicity
- No Check Engine Light
- Perfect Fitment 

This AWE (3015-43106) Touring Edition Cat-Back Exhaust System with 4" Black Tips uses AWE’s proprietary sound cancellation solution to give your GT the perfect tone, without drone, to deliver the ultimate mix of performance and sophistication. This cat-back exhaust is proudly made in the USA and features 3" diameter CNC mandrel-bent piping and 4" quad tips in black diamond, along with a muffler, H-pipe assembly and more! 

This Kit Includes:
- (1) H-Pipe Assembly
- (1) Driver Side Axle-Back Section
- (1) Passenger Side Axle-Back Section
- (1) Driver Side Intermediate Pipe
- (1) Passenger Side Intermediate Pipe
- (4) 4" (102mm) Slash-Cut Double-Walled Black Tips
- (4) 3" Accu-Seal Clamps
- (4) 3" T-Bolt Clamps

*This exhaust will NOT fit 2015-2017 models regardless of installed valance.
*NOT designed for use with convertibles models. 

Tech Tip: With the help of P/N: HW4213, the AWE 1310-11022 Active Exhaust Valve Motor Bracket (sold separately), this cat-back system can be installed on 2018-2022 Active Exhaust GT models. It will NOT retain the Active Exhaust functionality on those models, but the optional bracket (NOT included) will allow you to keep the valve motors connected and relocated to a safe place so that the vehicle computer doesn’t throw any unwanted trouble codes.
Short Description: AWE Touring Edition Cat-Back Exhaust System with 4" Black Tips for 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 GT Fastback Mustangs without the Factory Active Exhaust Option.

Product Name: Borla Cat-Back Exhaust System Stainless Steel S-Type 3" With 4" Black Chrome Tips For Fastback GT 2018-2022
Description:
Take the sound pumping out of your 2018-2022 GT Fastback Mustang to a level that rivals that deep, throaty tone you hear roaring out of sporty, muscle cars with this Borla 140745BC Stainless Steel 3" S-Type Cat-Back Exhaust System with 4" Black Tips. This aftermarket exhaust system is specifically designed for Mustangs without the Factory Exhaust Option.

Features and Benefits:
- Simple Installation, Bolts Directly to the Stock Connection Point
- Full T-304 Stainless Steel Construction
- Black Chrome 4” Angle Cut Rolled Quad Exhaust Tips
- Borla Logo Embossed on each Exhaust Tip
- 3” Mandrel Bent Piping
- Straight Through Design with No Drone
- Deep, Sporty Muscle-Car Sound
- Significantly Lighter than the Factory Cat-Back System
- Utilizes an Integral X-Pipe
- Reuses Stock Exhaust Hangers and Mounts
- Includes All Necessary Hardware and Instructions for Installation
- Made in the USA

Fully constructed of T-304 stainless steel, this exhaust system utilizes 3” mandrel-bent piping that is laid out in a straight-through design. These manufacturing elements coupled with the black chromed-out exhaust tips yield an exhaust tone that is unhampered by drone. Additionally, this system is significantly lighter than your factory exhaust system to maintain the handling you’ve come to expect. On the installation side of the coin, this exhaust system utilizes the stock exhaust hangers and mounts and comes with all the required hardware and instructions to complete your project.

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2018-2022 GT Fastback Mustangs without the Factory Active Exhaust Option

Product Name: TSW Nurburgring Wheel 20"x10" Rotary Forged Matte Bronze 2005-2022
Description:
This TSW Nurburgring 20" x 10" wheel is named after the Nurburgring circuit, also known as "The Ring", which is located in Nurburg, Germany. The 22 km track was built in 1920 and became known as one of the toughest and most dangerous tracks in the world. Jacki Stewart went as far as nicknaming the track "the green hell". Through the 1950s and early 1970s the Nurburgring was the main venue for the German Grand Prix as part of the F1 World Championship. The new Nurburgring Grand Prix Track, called GP-Strecke was completed in 1984 and has hosted several Grand Prix events.

The TSW Nurburgring wheel is a one-piece rotary forged aluminum wheel, made to the highest standards of manufacturing. The Nurburgring wheel features seven Y-shaped spokes that extend outwards to the edge of the wheel. Features a Matte Bronze finish that can really complement the exterior of your Mustang. TSW completes the Nurburgring wheel with a matching center cap. An extra thick TSW emblem is used to prevent warping and fading.

This TSW wheel is manufactured using a highly advanced production technique: Rotary Forging. First, the wheel is molded with a very thick lip section. This lip section is then rolled to form the barrel of the wheel. As the wheel is rolled, the molecular structure of the aluminum is changed which enhances the strength of the alloy. The process allows for a much lighter weight than a regular cast wheel, while increasing the strength. Weight savings is in the outer rim of the wheel which dramatically reduces rotational mass and enhances your Mustang's performance.

TSW wheels are specific for each application. The widths and offsets were designed so this 20" x 10" Nurburgring wheel fits all 2005-2022 Mustangs perfectly. Correct sizing is important for proper fitment. Every TSW wheel is equipped with a special metal centering ring so the wheel fits your Mustang perfectly and vibrations are nonexistent. Although the wheel is lightweight, it is designed to handle the weight of your Mustang and the specific load rating is stamped on the back of the Nurburgring wheel. Also, TSW wheels are specifically designed to be TPMS compatible.

Every single TSW wheel is put through radial and lateral runout tests as well as balance testing. TSW tolerances are 1/2 the industry average ensuring precise machining and a wheel that will not cause any vibration issues.

Specifications:
- Size: 20" x 10"
- Lugs: 5x114.3mm (5x4.5")|
- Finish: Matte Bronze
- Backspacing: 7.07"
- Offset: +40mm
- Center Caps: Included

Tech Tip: Please see P/N: W749K-B if you are looking for a complete Wheel and Tire Package with a staggered fitment.

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2005-2017 V6 Mustangs
- 2007-2014 Shelby GT500 Mustangs
- 2015-2022 EcoBoost Mustangs
- 2005-2022 GT Mustangs
- 2012-2013 Boss 302

Tech Tip:
- These wheels are not intended for use with 2015+ Shelby GT350/GT350R or 2020+ Shelby GT500 model Mustangs.
- This 20" wheel will clear all available brake kits found on any of the 2005-2022 Mustang fitment mentioned in this listing.
*This wheel requires small diameter, tuner style lug nuts. Larger OEM style lug nuts will NOT work.
*Valve stem TPMS compatible (NOT Included). All 2007 and newer Mustangs use tire pressure sensors in each wheel. If you are ordering a wheel and tire package make sure to order a set of sensors to be installed during the tire mounting process. Without sensors, the tire pressure light will be illuminated on the dash.

Additional Notes:
- It is highly recommended that you have all of the proper equipment necessary so that your vehicle can have a perfect alignment done by a professional in both the front and the rear of your Mustang. You may also find the need for a pair of Steering Rack Limiters depending on the ride height of your Mustang and the tire selection you choose, See P/N: HW3096 for 2005-2014 models and P/N: HW4093 for 2015-2022 models.

Product Name: Niche Misano Wheel 20" x 10" Matte Anthracite 2005-2022
Description:
This Niche 20" x 10" Matte Anthracite Misano Wheel M116200065+40 will make your Mustang look one of a kind. Designed with a +40mm offset, the Misano wheel fits the 2005-2022 Mustangs perfectly. Ten spokes extend from the center to the outer edge of the wheel creating a nice concave profile. Spokes touch the outside lip of the wheel then extend inwards on the barrel stopping at a step towards the middle of the wheel. This one-piece, cast aluminum 20" x 10" wheel has a monoblock look without a lip. The open-style wheel shows off large brakes extremely well. A matte anthracite finish provides the 20" x 10" Misano with a stealthy look perfectly matching any Mustang. Niche completes the look with an engraved Niche center cap.

Wheel Specifications:
- Size: 20" x 10" 
- Bolt Pattern: 5-Lug
- Finish: Matte Anthracite
- Backspacing: 7.07"
- Offset: +40MM
- Center Caps Included

The Misano wheel is part of Niche's Sport Series which features cast aluminum monoblock construction without a lip. Spokes extend from the center to the outer edge of the wheel to maximize concavity, aggressive staggered fitments, and room for large caliper upgrades. Niche offers their 20" x 10" cast wheels at an affordable price while retaining the high-quality Niche is known for. Niche offers the same wheels for Mustangs that are found on many high-end supercars. Aggressive styling and high-quality manufacturing processes keep Niche one step ahead of the game.

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2005-2017 V6 Mustangs
- 2007-2014 Shelby GT500 Mustangs
- 2015-2022 EcoBoost Mustangs
- 2005-2022 GT Mustangs

*Also fits Boss 302, Bullitt, and Mach-1 Mustang models.

*Valve stem TPMS compatible. All 2007 and newer Mustangs use tire pressure sensors in each wheel.

Tech Tip: These wheels are not intended for use with 2015+ Shelby GT350/GT350R or 2020+ Shelby GT500 model Mustangs.

Additional Notes:
- This Niche wheel requires small diameter, tuner-style lug nuts (WHLLN7 and WHLLN8). Larger OEM-style lug nuts will NOT work.
- Because of the design on this wheel, it will require short-style valve stems in order to avoid contact with the brake caliper on some models.

Description:
This Niche 20" x 10" Satin Black Misano Wheel M117200065+40 will make your Mustang look like one of a kind. Designed with a +40mm offset, the Misano wheel fits the 2005-2014 Mustangs perfectly. Ten spokes extend from the center to the outer edge of the wheel creating a nice concave profile. Spokes touch the outside lip of the wheel then extend inwards on the barrel stopping at a step towards the middle of the wheel. The Misano wheel is part of Niche's Sport Series which features cast aluminum monoblock construction without a lip. One of the easiest ways to get the biggest visual impact from an upgrade to your 2005-2014 Mustang is by adding some new wheels from CJ Pony Parts. With the addition of matching tires, your Mustang can look amazing in no time.

Product Name: Roush Cold Air Intake Kit Mustang GT 2018-2022
Description:
If you’re on the hunt for a great way to boost performance in your 2018-2022 GT Mustang, it’s time to take a closer look at this Roush Cold Air Intake Kit that’s now available at CJ Pony Parts! It’s easy to install and is less restrictive than your stock airbox!

Features and Benefits:
- Increases Performance and Presence
- Improves Throttle Response
- More Efficient Than Standard Stock Airbox with Superior Filtration Properties
- Allows for Latent Potential in Power and Fuel Efficiency that Would Otherwise be Restricted
- Provides Reduced Pressure Drop
- Custom Tune Not Required: System Engineered and Tested Specifically for this Application to Ensure MAF Signal Performance Matches Factory Settings
- CAD-Designed for Optimized Hood Sealing and Performance
- Includes Innovative Airbox Lid with See-Through Lens and Roush Logo
- Includes Dry Filter with Clamp that’s Proven to Retain Its Shape Under High Airflow
- Filter Has Inner and Outer Layer of Wire Mesh for Durability and Reliable Support of Filtration Media
- Filter Does Not Require Oiling and is Washable for Re-Use
- Kit Also Includes Injection-Molded Lower Airbox/Tray with Airbox Lid, Blow-Molded Clean Air Tubes and All Necessary Mounting Hardware
- Uses Factory Emissions and Vacuum Lines
- Quick and Easy Installation: Uses Factory Mounting Locations and Hardware
- CARB E.O# D-418-31 for 2018-2021 models ONLY

This Roush (422086) Cold Air Intake Kit is just what you need to improve your GT’s performance and presence! You’ll see an improvement in throttle response and more! This cold air intake is more efficient than standard stock airboxes and allows for latent potential in power and fuel efficiency that would otherwise be restricted. Plus, no custom tune is needed after installation since this kit was specifically engineered and tested for your application. This kit comes with an innovative airbox lid with a see-through lens, a washable dry filter that’s proven to retain its shape under high airflow, air tubes, installation hardware and more! Installation is quick and easy because you’ll use your factory mounting locations and hardware.

*Will require you to remove your factory sound tube and trim the factory engine cover for installation. 

Tech Tip: With this Roush Cold Air Intake Kit, you can remove the included MAF insert for larger bore MAF and re-calibrate or custom tune your PCM for even more power. (Calibration or tune file is NOT included.) 

Please Note: While this part will fit the 2022 Mustang GT, it is not EO/EPA compliant for 2022 Mustang GT models. CARB Approval only applies to 2018-2021 GT Mustangs.
Short Description: Roush Cold Air Intake Kit for 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 GT Mustangs.

Product Name: Airaid Cold Air Intake System MXP Series Performance With Synthamax Filter Mustang GT 2018-2022
Description:
Address the shortcomings of your 2018-2022 GT Mustang's factory air box by upgrading to the Airaid MXP Series Performance Cold Air Intake System 455-356 with Synthamax Filter. Gain horsepower and acceleration with this high-performance MXP Series Air Intake System. All mounting equipment is included for a straightforward installation!

Features and Benefits:
- High Airflow Premium Filter
- Washable and Reusable Air Filter
- Non-Woven Synthetic Filter Material
- Oil-Free Filter
- Potential gains of 16 HP and 12 Ft/Lb of Torque
- Yellow Filter Color
- High-Density Cross-Linked Polyethylene Intake Pipe
- Made in the USA

The replacement one-piece roto-molded air box frees up restricted airflow to be directed through a new air intake tube that is constructed of cross-linked, high-density polyethylene. Many MXP Air Intake Systems have a built-in velocity stack, which further promotes airflow. This system will increase airflow while maintaining proper air-to-fuel ratios, thereby eliminating the need for recalibration after installation.

Included:
- Hose Clamps
- Couplers
- Intake Pipe
- Filter Shield

Tech Tip: This Intake does not require a tune but would yield greater results when paired with one.

Please Note: This item is not CARB (California Air Resource Board) exempt and is not legal for sale or use in the state of California.

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2018-2022 GT Mustang
Short Description: Airaid MXP Series Performance Cold Air Intake System with Synthamax Filter for 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021 and 2022 GT Mustangs.

Product Name: Black Rhino Armory Wheel Gun Black 17”x9.5” Bronco 2021-2022
Description:
Black Rhino looked at the new 2021 and 2022 Bronco and felt that the factory wheels did not fully capture the strength of the new design. This 17”x9.5” Gun Black Armory Wheel perfectly complements any Bronco’s exterior finish, while adding a better profile to the new body design. The wheel takes after the wheels used on military wheels and has included a circular bead lock design around the exterior of the wheel and a large circular wheel hub. To complete the wheel, a 17”x9.5” wheel construction provides excellent grip and contrast when heading onto the toughest trails or hitting your city’s streets.

Wheel Specifications:
- Diameter: 17”
- Width: 9.5”
- Backspacing: 5.490”
- Offset: 6mm
- Bolt Patterns: 6x135/6x139.7
- Bore: 106.10mm
- Load Rating: 2,450 Pounds
- Wheel Weight: 36.5 Pounds

Please Note: This wheel may sit out farther than your factory flares on Base, Big Bend, Black Diamond, Outer Banks, and Badlands models without the Sasquatch package. This wheel may sit flush to the flare or sunk in slightly on Wildtrak, First Edition, or Models Equip with the Sasquatch package.
Short Description: Black Rhino 17”x9.5” Gun Black Armory Wheel for 2021 and 2022 Bronco.

Product Name: Ford Performance Wheels Black/Machined 18”x8” Set Bronco 2021-2022
Description:
This set of 5 Ford Performance Wheels features a Black base with Machined a Face, 18" X 8" sizing, and are direct OEM Wheels designed to fit the 2021 and 2022 Bronco. The black and machined finish is complemented by the robust stature of the wheel, while the black Chrome Ford oval center caps complete the wheel’s profile. The finish is reinforced and protected with an OEM clear coating, resisting scratches, fading, and corrosion.

Features and Benefits:
- Designed to Fit 2021 and 2022 Broncos
- Factory Gloss Black Paint Finish, With Machined Face
- 18" x 8" Wheelbase
- Black Chrome Ford Oval Center Caps
- TMPS Sensors and Activation Tool Kit

This set also includes TPMS sensors and an activation tool to simplify installation. To top it off, the wheel’s 18" X 8" measurement was designed to fit onto the Bronco without a lift kit.

Please Note: This set of wheels is not designed for use on the Bronco Sport.
Short Description: Set of Black and Machined 18”x8” Ford Performance Wheels for 2021 and 2022 Broncos.

Description:
Fuel has created the 20”x9” Rebel 6 Wheel to provide a modern split six-spoke design, that can take on the trails as well as the trails. A matte black finish mirrors the wheel extended lip, while a concaved face creates a larger wheel profile on your 2021-2022 Bronco. The wheel is constructed of one-piece cast aluminum, rated up to 2,300 pounds of load capacity for the toughest trails. The contoured lip extends out from the center for added depth, while Fuel’s signature hubcap shines a bright silver from the center of the wheel.

Wheel Specifications:
- Diameter: 20”
- Width 9”
- Backspacing: 5.790”
- Offset: 20mm
- Bolt Pattern: 6x139.7
- Bore: 106.10mm
- Load Rating: 2,300 Pounds

Please Note: This wheel may sit out farther than your factory flares on Base, Big Bend, Black Diamond, Outer Banks, and Badlands models without the Sasquatch package. This wheel may sit flush to the flare or sunk in slightly on Wildtrak, First Edition, or Models Equip with the Sasquatch package.
Short Description: Fuel 20”x9” Matte Black Rebel 6 Wheel for 2021-2022 Broncos.

Product Name: Fuel Covert Wheel 18" X 9" Matte Bronze/ Black Ring Bronco 2021-2022
Description:
Deck out your 2021-2022 Bronco with the legendary 18" X 9" Covert Wheel (D69618908457), a one-piece cast aluminum structure with a matte bronze finish. Fuel completed the look with a black ring and a +20mm offset. As a result, the mounting surface is in front of the centerline for a look that's more flush to the body of your ride. 

Specifications: 
- Diameter: 18”  
- Width: 9”  
- Bolt Pattern: 6x139.7   
- Bore: 106.10mm  
- Backspacing: 5.790  
- Offset: +20mm  
- Load Rating: 2,500lb   
- Weight: 34lbs Each
- Finish: Matte Bronze/Black 

Weighing in at 34lbs each with a 2,500lb load rating, the Covert Wheel is ready to confront on- and off-road challenges. Thanks to a 6x139.7 bolt pattern, the Covert bolts right up to your Bronco for a secure fit. 

Additional Notes:
- This wheel may sit out farther than your factory flares on Base, Big Bend, Black Diamond, Outer Banks, and Badlands models without the Sasquatch package. This wheel may sit flush to the flare or sunk in slightly on Wildtrak, First Edition, or models equipped with the Sasquatch package.
- TPMS sensors are required to maintain the factory tire pressure monitoring system in your Bronco. If you choose not to include TPMS sensors, you will have a warning light on your dashboard indicating low tire pressure.

These Covert Wheels are also available with your choice of tires in sets of (four and/or five). All wheel and tire packages from CJ Pony Parts are professionally mounted and balanced in-house and ship to your door ready to bolt on.
Short Description: Fuel Matte Bronze 18" X 9" Covert Wheel with a Black Ring for 2021-2022 Broncos.

Product Name: Ford Safari Bar Kit For Modular Front Bumper Bronco 2021-2022
Garage Friendly Name: Modular Front Bumper Safari Bar Kit
Description:
For extra durability on offroad excursions, this Ford Safari Bar (M2DZ-17D957-AB) is a rugged addition to your Modular Front Bumper. It bolts directly onto the popular Modular Front Bumper upgrade on your Bronco.

Features and Benefits:
- Bolts directly to the optional Modular Front Bumper
- 2-inch diameter, black powder-coated tube
- Constructed of cold-rolled steel
- Corrosion-resistant mounting hardware included

Protect the front of your Bronco with this rugged Ford Safari Bar. Constructed from cold-rolled steel, this bar bolts directly to the optional Modular Front Bumper. In addition to protecting the front end of your 2021-2022 Bronco, this Safari bar can be used to mount additional lights.

Please Note: Not for use with plastic bumper options and will not fit the Bronco Sport.
Short Description: Ford Safari Bar Kit for 2021-2022 Ford Broncos with Modular Front Bumpers.

Product Name: DV8 Offroad Bull Bar Bolt-On For Factory Steel Bumper Bronco 2021-2022
Description:
The DV8 Offroad Bull Bar (LBBR-06) gives your Bronco a dynamic, low-profile appearance while adding options to the bumper area. The bull bar is designed to be a great alternative to the OEM bull bar and sits much lower in front of the grille than the OEM version. Your lighting options are open with this bull bar. Included are two adjustable light mounts that allow for LED lighting either above or below the bar via 20” light bars, or LED pod lights on each of the two tabs.

Features and Benefits: 
- Multiple lighting options available through two adjustable lighting mounts
- Micro-textured black powder-coat finish
- Rust-resistant and durable
- OEM bull bar replacement sits lower than the OEM version
- Sleek low-profile appearance
- Quick and easy bolt-on installation

This bull bar has a black micro-texture powder-coat finish that provides excellent rust resistance. The mounting plates are constructed of 3mm steel, while the bar is made from 1.5” diameter x 1.5mm thick steel tubing. DV8 Offroad designed installation around the eight factory bolts already present on the Bronco’s steel bumper for an easy half-hour installation process.

*Tech Tips:
- This bull bar light mount works great with other DV8 Offroad Factor Bumper Pocket Light Mounts.

Please Note: This bull bar does not fit the factory plastic bumper.
Short Description: DV8 Offroad Bolt-on Bull Bar for Factory Steel Bumper for 2021 and 2022 Broncos.

Product Name: Rough Country Plastic Front Bumper Nudge Bar Without Lights Bronco 2021-2022
Garage Friendly Name: Plastic Front Bumper Nudge Bar w/o Lights
Description:
In addition to protecting the front end of your 2021-2022 Bronco, the Rough Country Front Bumper Nudge Bar can feature an aftermarket lighting solution. If you're in sole need of protection that will offer durability to your grille, this tubular 3-inch steel Nudge Bar can be purchased alone. Once installed, you can add other aftermarket designs such as mounting spotlights and winches.

Otherwise, Rough Country engineered this off-road solution for damage control and added visibility with choices including 20-inch light bars and/or LED lighting options.

Features and Benefits:
- Straightforward Bolt-On Installation
- Constructed of 3" Steel Tubing to Withstand Minor Accidents
- Corrosion-Resistant Black Powdercoat
- Includes Nudge Bar, Mounting Brackets, and Hardware 
- Available with your Choice of Lighting
- Black or Chrome Series 20" Single Row Light Bars
- Daytime Running Lights or OSRAM Wide Angle LEDs

The powerful LED, single-row light bars come in either a Black or Chrome Series. The Chrome Series focuses on a brighter projection while the Black Series offers a subtle appearance to complement your Bronco's body.

Rough Country’s all-weather LED lights feature a durable, die-cast aluminum housing and include a premium, waterproof, flat-wound, braided wiring harness with a toggle switch and in-line fuse.

Additional Notes:
- Requires minor cutting/drilling.
- LEDs are for off-road use ONLY.
- May interfere with parking sensors, proximity sensors, and external cruise control sensors.
- This Rough Country nudge bar is not designed for use on the Bronco Sport.
- This Rough Country nudge bar will only fit Bronco models with a factory plastic front bumper.
Short Description: Rough Country Plastic Front Bumper Nudge Bar without Lights for 2021 and 2022 Broncos.

Product Name: Borla Axle-Back Exhaust Kit S-Type Dual Exit 2.5" With Black Tips Bronco 2.7L 2021-2022
Garage Friendly Name: 2.5" S-Type Dual Exit with 4" Black Tips
Description:
With its signature S-Type sound profile, this Borla Exhaust System (11977CB) improves the sound and power of your Bronco. The mandrel-bent pipes flow into a no-drone muffler that produces a deep and exciting exhaust note. The system exits through 4" black coated T304 stainless steel exhaust tips.

Features and Benefits:
- Axle-Back Exhaust System
- S-Type Sound Level
- 2.5" Inlet Flows Into 2.75" Muffler Inlet & Dual 2.5" Tailpipes
- 4" Black Coated T-304 Stainless Steel Tips

These 2.5" inlet pipes flow into a 2.75" pipe, exiting out the 4" dual tips. The full 304 stainless steel construction makes the system resistant to damage from rust or corrosion. Unique hangers keep the system tucked nicely under your factory exhaust.
Short Description: Borla 2.5" S-Type Dual Exit Axle-Back Exhaust Kit with Black Tips for 2021-2022 2.7L Broncos.

Product Name: AWE Cat Back Exhaust System 0FG 3” Dual Exit With 4-1/2” Diamond Black Tips Bronco 2021-2022
Garage Friendly Name: 3" 0FG Dual Exit with 4.5" Diamond Black Tips
Description:
Made with performance gains in mind, AWE’s 0FG Cat Back Exhaust System is an excellent drop-in upgrade for your 2021-2022 Bronco. The system features 3” piping for a wider path of travel for gases, and 4-1/2” Diamond Black Tips for increased exit velocity and a performance exhaust tone. The 3” piping allows the gasses to travel in a wider area, decreasing stress on the engine and fuel emissions while increasing fuel mileage.

Features and Benefits:
- 3” Modular Cat Back Exhaust Piping
- Dual 4.5” Double-Walled Diamond Black Tips
- Made from CNC Mandrel-Bent, U.S.-Sourced T304L Stainless Steel
- Straight-Flow Exhaust Design For Maximum Performance And Tone
- Proudly Engineered, Designed, and Manufactured in the USA
- Locking Collars for Exhaust Hangers to Prevent Movement
- Pure Bolt-on Design For Easy Installation

A 4.5” dual exit allows the gasses to exit at a better angle and velocity, providing an aggressive tone and excellent curb appeal with their Black Diamond finish. Finally, with a 100% bolt-on design, installing the AWE Cat Back Exhaust system is as easy as swapping out the factory system.

Specifications:
- 2.7TT dyno verified gains of 4 hp and 3 ft-lbs of torque at the wheels
- 2.3T dyno-verified gains of 3 hp and 3 ft-lbs of torque at the wheels
Short Description: AWE Dual Exit 3” 0FG Cat Back Exhaust System with 4-1/2” Diamond Black Tips for 2021 and 2022 Broncos.

Product Name: MBRP Cat-Back Exhaust System 3" Black Coated Aluminized Steel Single Exit Bronco 2021-2022
Garage Friendly Name: 3" Armor BLK Street with 4" Black Tip
Description:
One of the first crucial upgrades to your off-road 2021-2022 Bronco is the exhaust. You'll need to support the 2.3L or 2.7L EcoBoost engine by improving the exhaust exit. The high-flow Black Coated Aluminized Steel 3" Cat-Back Exhaust System (S5235BLK) from MBRP shoots out the exhaust from a massive four-inch, dual-walled tip that has been angle-cut for a Sport-like appearance. From the cat to the back is black-coated, aluminized steel tubing spanning three inches in diameter. The tubing is mandrel-bent for smooth airflow that increases your engine's horsepower and torque anywhere from 35 to 93 percent. Easily install the system with help of downloadable instructions.

Features and Benefits:
- Bolt-On Installation
- Smooth 3" Mandrel Bent Tubing
- Utilizes OEM Hanger Locations
- Black Coated Finish
- 4" OD Dual Wall, Angle Cut Tip Included
- Up to 35% Flow Increase as Tested on 2.7l
- Up to 93% Flow Increase as Tested on 2.3L
- Increased Horsepower/ Torque

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2021-2022 Bronco 2/4-Door 2.3L/ 2.7L EcoBoost
Short Description: MBRP Single Exit Black Coated Aluminized Steel 3" Cat-Back Exhaust System for 2021 and 2022 Broncos.

Product Name: Bushwacker Pocket-Style Fender Flares Textured Black Bronco 2-Door 2021-2022
Description:
Bushwacker Fender Flares (20965-02) protect your 2021-2022 Bronco from rocks and debris while adventuring off-road. When kicking up debris, these warp-resistant fender flares will protect your Bronco's body from damage.

Features and Benefits:
- Smoother Finish than Textured Matte-Black Flares
- Thick, Warp-Resistant DuraFlex 2000 ABS
- Stylish Recessed Stainless Steel Bolts
- Accommodates up to 35-inch Tires
- Each Flare Adds about 1-1/2 inch of Tire Coverage

In addition to protecting the body of your Bronco, these fender flares provide enough clearance for oversize 35" tires. These flares are made out of DuraFlex 2000 ABS plastic and coated in an OEM-style textured black finish. They are treated for scuff resistance and UV protection to prevent chalking.

Specifications:
- Front Flare Height: 6.13
- Front Flare Tire Coverage: 1.50
- Rear Flare Height: 7.00
- Rear Flare Tire Coverage: 1.50
- Style: Pocket/Rivet

Tech Tip: When you open the box, you'll notice that the edge trim and hex-head "bolts" have not been pre-assembled from the factory. This allows for an easier prep and paint process for those who want to further personalize this custom-style upgrade. After painting the Fender Flares, simply install the hardware and proceed to install the Flares onto your Bronco.

Please Note: These fender flares are not for use on the Bronco Sport.

Garage Friendly Name: Black Plastic Fender Flare Delete Set
Description:
That narrow body style you keep envisioning on your 2021-2022 Ford Bronco is possible thanks to these Fender Flare Deletes (DZ4617) from Dee Zee! This is a complete 4-piece set that removes your factory fender flares and provides a cleaner look.

Features and Benefits:
- Complete 4-piece fender flare delete set
- Removes fender flares for a narrower look
- HDPE plastic construction
- Black finish blends with any vehicle
- Includes installation hardware
- Easy no-drill installation
- Made in the USA!

Each piece replaces the factory fender flare over your Bronco's tires and creates a narrower, more traditional body shape. They also feature a black finish that blends with any factory vehicle color. For an easy no-drill installation, these USA-made Fender Flare Deletes (DZ4617) conveniently include installation hardware!

Armor up with a set of Ford Fender Flares (VMB3Z-16268-D)! When you’d like to add a personal touch to your 2021-2022 Bronco, Ford Performance has you covered with their Sasquatch Fender Flare Set. Garage Friendly Name: Textured Black Trail Armor Front Corner Guards

Made to protect your 2021-2022 Bronco from harsh trails, Bushwacker’s Textured Black Trail Armor Front Corner Guards mount to your side fenders with no modifications needed. Product Name: Roush Cold Air Intake System 2.3L/ 2.7L Bronco 2021-2022
Description:
Off-road vehicles leave their engine susceptible to dirty air that commonly induces dirt buildup in the airbox. The induction system from Roush creates an airtight intake gasket seal to block out debris and lengthen the life of your 2021-2022 Bronco's air intake and engine. Combined with the R Series pre-filter, the Roush Cold Air Intake System repels water and large debris across 30 percent more surface area than stock filters.

Features and Benefits:
- Increases Air Filtration Area by 30%
- Retains Water Fording Depth to Protect Engine
- Intake Gasket Provides Airtight Seal
- Uses Factory Mounting Locations and Hardware
- Simple Maintenance with See-Thru Window
- Enhanced Turbo 2.3 or 2.7L Engine Sounds
- R-Series Pre-filter Features "R" Logo

Non-restricted airflow keeps the 2.3L or 2.7L engine running at its peak performance. When it comes time for maintenance, a see-thru window provides real-time monitoring of the air filter without removal for inspection. An R-Series pre-filter will slide over the intake for added filtration that can be easily removed for cleaning. Installing the Cold Air Intake System outside of your engine requires no modifications, and uses the factory mounting locations to retain the 2021-2022 Bronco underhood appearance.

Please Note: The Air Intake System will not fit the Sport model Broncos.
Short Description: Roush Cold Air Intake System for 2021-2022 2.3L and 2.7L Broncos.

Description:
A direct fit for the 2021-2022 2.3L Bronco, this K&N Aircharger Cold Air Intake System (63-2620) improves horsepower and throttle response via increased airflow to the engine. The increased supply of cold air, which is denser in oxygen than warm air, promotes an effective combustion reaction and ultimately translates to more engine power. 

Features and Benefits:
- Direct-Fit Cold Air Intake Upgrade
- Increases Horsepower and Throttle Response
- Includes K&N’s Signature Oiled Red Cone Filter
- Able to Travel 100,000 Miles Before Being Serviced
- No Modifications Needed for Installation
- Straightforward installation Process 
- Rotationally Molded Intake Manifold
- Proudly Made in the USA! 

The key to K&N's Aircharger Cold Air Intake System is its enclosed box design. It prevents contaminants from entering the filter, so that your engine is powered by only the cleanest air. The box features an accessible design, making it easier than ever to reach the filter without tools when servicing is required.
Short Description: K&N Aircharger Cold Air Intake System for 2021-2022 2.3L Broncos.

Product Name: CJ Classics Quarter Panel Full Passenger Side Coupe 1965-1966
Description:
If you're restoring a classic 1965-1966 Coupe Mustang, then you're probably already familiar with rust. It can easily mar just about every metal part on your vintage Pony, especially bigger pieces of sheet metal, like your quarter panels. Fortunately, CJ Classics makes this high-quality Full Quarter Panel, and you can order it from CJ Pony Parts!

This CJ Classics Full Quarter Panel is available for the driver side, passenger side or as a pair. It covers the same area as your original one: it extends from inside the door jamb and wraps around the back to the attaching point with the rear taillight panel and quarter panel extensions and then goes over the top body line to the base of the roof. It also includes the side trunk drain channel. Made of metal and then painted black to help resist rust and other corrosion-related issues, this CJ Classics Full Quarter Panel is an excellent way to spruce up your Mustang's exterior without breaking the bank!

*This quarter panel is available individually for the driver or passenger side or as a complete pair of each. Please indicate your desired fitment in the drop-down menu.

Product Name: Full Quarter Panel One-Piece Driver Side Fastback 1965-1966
Garage Friendly Name: Driver Side One-Piece Full Quarter Panel
Description:
If you've been trying to figure out a solution to the severe rust on your 1965-1966 Fastback Mustang's quarter panels, then CJ Pony Parts has you covered! Order this new One-Piece Full Quarter Panel for your Fastback today from CJ Pony Parts!

This One-Piece Full Quarter Panel is made out of heavy-gauge stamped steel, and it's the best solution for Fastbacks that have extensive rust and other damage to their quarter panels. This full quarter panel has a convenient one-piece design that includes the quarter panel itself as well as the sail panel that goes around the rear quarter window. This panel also comes with the lip that extends into the door jamb and the lip that extends into the rocker area. Not only that, it also comes with the trunk lid drain rail and the area at the rear of the quarter panel where the quarter panel extensions mount. And, while you might need to make some modifications for it to fit your specific Mustang, you'll find that this One-Piece Full Quarter Panel is one of the best money can buy! You can order it for just the driver side, just the passenger side or as a pair.

Having polished and well-kept Mustang quarter panels can go a long way toward both keeping you safe and maintaining your Ford Mustang's curb appeal.

Product Name: CJ Classics Roof Panel In Weld-Thru Primer Fastback 1965-1966
Description: Stop wasting your time trying to repair that old, rusted-out roof panel. Upgrade to CJ Classics' roof panel, constructed from high-quality stamped steel with a weld-thru primer finish. This roof panel should be used as a skin to repair a fastback roof with dents or rust damage.<br /><br /> <strong>Advantages of Weld-Thru Primer:</strong><br /> - Reduces prep time when welding new parts to new parts that are both covered in the weld thru primer<br /> - Reduced spatter<br /> - Lower distortion of the panels<br /> - Superior conductive properties that help minimize high heat zone problems<br /> - Eliminates corrosion that would form between overlapped panels or multi-layered spot welds<br /> - Helps when welding a new panel to old metal<br /> - Lower resistance at the weld surface allows better penetration into the denser, new steel that helps forgive an old alloy's problems with porosity and impurities<br /> - Helps prevent resin build up between welds that can trap moisture in the old porous steel that leads to failure at the weld borders<br /><br /> <em>*Does NOT include underside roof braces. Reuse originals or purchase separately.</em>

Product Name: CJ Classics Disc Brake Conversion Kit With Plain Rotors And Cast Aluminum Calipers Small Bearing 8"/9" Rear Mustang 1965-1973
Garage Friendly Name: Rear Disc Brake Conversion Kit - Plain Rotors

Putting rear disc brakes on your 1965-1973 Mustang will take your braking performance to a whole new level by significantly improving its overall stopping power. Designed specifically for Mustangs that have an 8" or 9" small bearing rear axle, this Rear CJ Classics Disc Conversion Kit will provide you with everything you need to convert & upgrade the brakes in your Pony’s rear, including new rotors, calipers, pads and all of the necessary hardware!

Kit Includes:
- 11.25" Brake Rotors
- Loaded Single Piston Calipers
- Brake Pads
- Flex Hoses
- Caliper to Axle Housing Mounting Brackets
- Weld-On Hose Brackets
- Parking Brake Cables
- All Necessary Mounting Hardware

This Rear CJ Classics Disc Brake Conversion Kit will upgrade your Mustang's overall stopping power. These brakes have a built-in parking brake function within calipers and have flex hoses are provided to tie into your existing cable system to allow this conversion to be compatible with most aftermarket rear ends. Purchasing this kit will also provide your with all of the brackets & spacers, as well as all of the other correct mounting hardware to successfully convert your classic Mustang's rear brake assembly.

This rear brake kit will not just improve your vintage Mustang's performance, but will also add a nice stylish touch as well. You'll be able to customize your kit by choosing whether you want your 11.25" brake rotors to be plain or slotted & drilled. You will also be able to choose the overall finish of your loaded single piston calipers which are available in a red or black powder coating, as well as a cast aluminum finish.

*This kit is designed for Mustangs with have a 8" or 9" small bearing rear axle ONLY.

Please Note: This rear disc brake conversion kit will NOT fit Mustangs that are equipped with staggered shocks.

Go ahead and purchase a Rear Disc Brake Conversion Kit for your 1965, 1966, 1967, 1968, 1969, 1970, 1971, 1972 or 1973 Mustang with an 8" or 9" Small Bearing Rear Axle from CJ Pony Parts today!

Product Name: Ford Performance GT Performance Pack Wheel 19"x9.5" Matte Black 2005-2022
Description:
If you want a more aggressive stance and style for your 2005-2022 Mustang, you need to check out this Matte Black 19" x 9.5" GT Performance Pack Wheel from Ford Performance. Based on the wheel found on GT Mustangs with the Performance Package option, this wheel features a modern spoke pattern that will look great on any Mustang and will have heads turning in your direction no matter where you are.

Wheel Specs and Dimensions:
- Size: 19" x 9" (front) and 19” x 9.5” (rear)
- Lugs: 5 x 114.3mm (5 x 4.5")
- Finish: Matte Black
- Backspacing: 6.77” and 7.32”
- Offset: +45mm and +52.5mm
- Center Bore: 70.6mm
- Construction: Cast Aluminum
- Weight: 32.5 lbs. and 32.4 lbs.
- Center Caps: Included

This wheel (M-1007-M1995B) is inspired by the wheel on Performance Pack GT Mustangs but features a matte black finish rather than gloss black. It will look great on any style or color Mustang. Made to stand out and give your Pony an aggressive stance, the split spoke design and concave center cap creates dimension. Ford Performance constructs this wheel using cast aluminum for a durable wheel that will stand the test of time. You can purchase this wheel individually or as a staggered set.

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2005-2017 V6 Mustang
- 2007-2014 Shelby GT500 Mustang
- 2015-2022 EcoBoost Mustang
- 2005-2022 GT Mustang
- 2012-2013 Boss 302 Mustang

Tech Tip: These wheels are NOT intended for use with 2015+ Shelby GT350/GT350R, 2020+ Shelby GT500, Mach-1 or any Mustangs equipped with factory MagneRide suspension like Performance Pack 2 (PP2) optioned GT’s and some Bullitt models.

*The 19” x 9.5” wheel is designed for rear fitment only.
*Will accept installation of any 2015-2022 factory center cap or aftermarket center caps designed for the factory wheels.
*Valve stem TPMS compatible for all Mustangs with a tire pressure sensor in each wheel (NOT Included).
*This 19" wheel will clear all available brake kits found on any 2005-2022 Mustang.

Please Note: This wheel does not require small diameter, tuner style lug nuts. The larger OEM style lug nuts will work along with some of the other great factory bulge options that we have available.

Product Name: Carroll Shelby Wheel Company CS-3 Wheel 20"X11" Chrome Powder Mustang 2005-2022
Description:
The Mustang has always had an aggressive, muscular style that has driven its popularity to the point where it’s at today as one of the most popular sports cars. But, if you want to enhance the appearance of your 2005-2022 Mustang further, then this Carroll Shelby Wheel Company Chrome Powder 20" x 11" CS-3 Wheel from CJ Pony Parts is just the upgrade you need!

The CS-3 Wheel from Carroll Shelby Wheel Company is the first wheel in their new line of flow-formed wheels. Flow-form casting creates a wheel that is lighter and stronger than a traditional cast wheel. The sporty Y-spoke design of the wheel takes inspiration from the new 2018 GT Mustang Performance Pack 2 wheel that has quickly gained popularity. It comes in a brilliant chrome powder finish that really pops against any color Mustang! Featuring the iconic ‘SHELBY’ name engraved into the lip of the wheel, the CS-3 wheel will also include a center cap with the Carroll Shelby signature logo. If you have larger brakes on your Mustang, not to worry, the CS-3 Wheel has been engineered to clear big brake systems.

This 20" x 11" wheel (P/N: CS3-215455-CP) is designed for rear fitment only and will give your Mustang a more aggressive stance. You can purchase this wheel individually or as a staggered set of four. If you order a set, you will receive two 20" x 9.5" wheels for the front and two 20" x 11" wheels for the back.

Wheel Specs and Dimensions:
- Size: 20" x 9.5" (front) and 20” x 11” (rear)
- Lugs: 5 x 114.3mm (5 x 4.5")
- Finish: Chrome Powder
- Backspacing: 6.80" and 7.94”
- Offset: +40mm (front) and +50mm (rear)
- Center Bore: 70.7mm
- Construction: Flow-Formed Aluminum
- Weight: 28 lbs. and 29 lbs.
- Center Caps: Included

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2005-2017 V6 Mustangs
- 2007-2014 Shelby GT500 Mustangs
- 2015-2022 EcoBoost Mustangs
- 2005-2022 GT Mustangs

*Also fits Boss 302, Bullitt, and Mach-1 Mustang models.
*The 20” x 11” wheel is designed for rear fitment only.
*Valve stem TPMS compatible for all 2005-2022 Mustangs with a tire pressure sensor in each wheel (NOT Included).
*This 20" wheel will clear all available brake kits found on any 2015-2022 V6, EcoBoost or GT Mustang.

Additional Notes:
- This wheel requires small diameter, tuner style lug nuts. Larger OEM style lug nuts will NOT work.
- These wheels are not intended for use with 2015+ Shelby GT350/GT350R or 2020+ Shelby GT500 model Mustangs.

Popular demand brought the Carroll Shelby Wheel Company Gloss Black 19" x 11" CS-5 Wheel into the aftermarket of 2005-2022 Mustang wheels. Featuring curved, elegant lines, and lightweight flow-formed construction, the CS-5 has been independently tested in the USA to SAE J2530 safety and durability standards. The CS-5 is a Carroll Shelby officially licensed product that offers the long-lasting strength you need.

Product Name: Velgen Wheels Lightweight Series VF5 Wheel 20" X 10.5" Gloss Bronze Mustang 2005-2022
Description:
Keep your S197 or S550 ready on or off the track with a strong Velgen Wheels Gloss Bronze 20" X 10.5" Lightweight Series VF5 Wheel. The lightweight aluminum construction offers durability via USA flow formed technology that compresses the aluminum. Velgen Wheels combined durability and weight reduction in the aftermarket gloss bronze VF5 wheel. 

During construction, Velgen is able to add pressure to the inner barrel of the wheels after casting which causes the barrel to stretch while also compressing the aluminum. The wheels are then sent through multiple CNC machining stages for a product that is ready to be finished in a durable powder coat that will create a unique appearance for just about any Mustang.

- Weight: 24 lbs.

Description:
Are you looking to change the exterior appearance of your 2005-2014 Mustang? If so you might be interested in this 20" x 9.5" Matte Black KPS Wheel with a Gloss Black Window from Rotiform. Rotiform is a well-known wheel manufacturer that is known for providing high-end vehicles with one of a kind wheels.

This Rotiform R139209565+35 Matte Black KPS Wheel with Gloss Black Windows feature a 5-spoke design that splits into a V-Shape. The thin split spokes extend from the barrel of the wheel that meets in the center of the wheel. The Rotiform KPS Wheel features a slight concave from the barrel of the wheel to the center of the wheel.

The Rotiform R139209565+35 KPS Wheel is a 1-piece cast monoblock wheel that is constructed with a new and innovative engineering method to produce a stronger and lighter wheel. Once the KPS Wheel is constructed the face of the wheel is powder coated in a matte black finish. The windows on the wheel are powder coated in a gloss black finish. Since the wheel has a Matte Black and a Gloss Black finish the exterior trim on your 2005-2014 Mustang will match perfectly.

This wheel is available as a single wheel or a set of four wheels or a set of wheels with tires.

*Valve stem TPMS compatible. All 2007 and newer Mustangs use tire pressure sensors in each wheel. If you are ordering a wheel and tire package make sure to order a set of TPMS to be installed during the tire mounting process. Without sensors, the tire pressure light will be illuminated on the dash.
*In order for this 20" wheel to clear the 14" Brembo brakes on 2007-2012 GT500, 2010-2014 GT and 2012-2013 Boss 302 Mustangs, you may need to switch to a 5mm wheel spacer (WHSP33) for additional caliper to spoke clearance.

Product Name: Niche Milan Wheel 19"x8.5" +35 Offset Machined Face with Silver 2005-2014
Description:
19" x 8.5" Niche Milan wheels will make your Mustang look like one of a kind. Designed with a +35mm offset, the Milan wheel fits the 2005-2014 Mustangs perfectly. Five spokes extend from the center to the outer edge of the wheel creating a nice concave profile. This one-piece, cast aluminum 19" x 8.5" wheel has a monoblock look without a lip. The open style wheel shows off large brakes extremely well. The face of this Niche Milan wheel features a beautiful machined surface, along with the outer edge of the wheel. The edge of the spokes and the rest of the wheel features a perfect silver finish. Niche engraves their logo in one spoke and a Niche center cap completes the look.

Wheel Information
Size:19" x 8.5"
Lugs:5-Lug
Finish:Machined Face with Silver
Offset:+35mm

This Niche wheel requires small diameter, tuner style lug nuts (WHLLN7 and WHLLN8). Larger OEM style lug nuts will NOT work.

Available individually, as a set of four wheels or a set with tires.

The Milan wheel is part of Niche's Sport Series which features cast aluminum monoblock construction without a lip. Spokes extend from the center to the outer edge of the wheel allowing maximum concavity, aggressive staggered fitments and room for large caliper upgrades. Niche offers their 19 x 8.5" cast wheels at an affordable price while retaining the high quality Niche is known for. Niche offers the same wheels for Mustangs that are found on many high end super cars. Aggressive styling and high quality manufacturing processes keep Niche one step ahead of the game.

*Valve stem TPMS compatible. All 2007 and newer Mustangs use tire pressure sensors in each wheel.
*19 inch and 20 inch Niche wheels will clear the 14 inch Brembo brakes on 2007-2012 GT500s, 2010-2014 GTs and 2012-2013 Boss 302s.
*Only 20 inch Niche wheels will clear the 15 inch Brembo brakes on 2013-2014 GT500s.

One of the easiest ways to get the biggest visual impact from an upgrade to your 2005-2014 Mustang is by adding some new wheels from CJ Pony Parts. If you want to stray away from common replica style wheels, Niche Road Wheels offers a variety of styles so your Mustang can be one of a kind. With the addition of matching tires, your Mustang can look amazing in no time!
Short Description: Niche 19" x 8.5"  Silver Milan Wheel with Machined Spoke Faces and +35 Offset for 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014 Mustangs.

Spokes are recessed from the edge of the wheel leaving an undefined lip. A black FOOSE center cap completes the look of the Legend wheel. FOOSE designed this wheel to fit under the Mustang perfectly with a +32mm offset. With a large diameter and wide open style wheel, the Legend shows off big brakes very well.

This wheel is modernly and aggressively manufactured and designed. You can purchase this wheel individually or as a staggered set of four.

- Finish: Satin Black
- Backspacing: 6.38" and 7.52”

This wheel is made from flow-formed aluminum. The satin black finish will perfectly complement any body color or style of Mustang. The 20" x 10.5" wheel (P/N: AR92420512745) is made for rear fitment only. If you purchase the staggered set, you'll receive two 20" x 9" wheels for the front and two 20" x 10.5" wheels for the rear. Staggered sets provide better grip and give the allusion of a larger lip and a more aggressive stance.

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2005-2017 V6 Mustangs
- 2007-2014 Shelby GT500 Mustangs
- 2015-2022 EcoBoost Mustangs
- 2005-2022 GT Mustangs
*Also fits Boss 302, Bullitt, and Mach-1 Mustang models.

*These wheels are not intended for use with 2015+ Shelby GT350/GT350R or 2020+ Shelby GT500 model Mustangs.

Product Name: JMS Avenger Series Race Wheel 15" X 10" Black Clear Diamond Cut Rear With Lug Nuts Mustang 1994-2004
Garage Friendly Name: Avenger Series Race - Black Clear Diamond Cut
Description:
The JMS Black Clear Diamond Cut 15" X 10" Avenger Series Race Rear Wheel A1510626FP is intended for normal, daily driving and those adventurous drag racing weekends. If you one or the other, or both, this lightweight cast-aluminum wheel is for your 1994-2004 Mustang. 

JMS Chip decided to mix these two powerhouses with their Avenger Series Black Clear Diamond Cut Finish wheels, and the results are awesome. These 5-spoke wheels feature an inner lip to distribute forces to the entire wheel, branded center caps, and matching lug nuts. Their one-piece cast aluminum construction is lightweight, but built tough for racing applications.

Features and Benefits:
- Direct Drill And Hub-Centric Fitment
- OEM-Type Conical Seat Lug Nuts
- High-Quality Black Clear Finish
- Optimized Back Spacing and Offset
- Color Matched Lug Nuts and Center Caps
- High-Pressure Cast Aluminum Construction

Specifications:
- Size: 15" x 10"
- Lugs: 5 x 114.3mm (5 x 4.5")
- Finish: Polished
- Backspacing: 6.26"
- Offset: +20.00mm
- Weight: 17 lbs.
- Center Caps: Included
- DOT approved

Kit Includes:
- (1) Wheel
- (1) Center Cap
- (5) 1/2"-20 Lug Nuts

*Intended for normal street driving and Drag Racing use.

Tech Tips:
- 2003-2004 SVT Cobra Mustangs will either require a GT Brake conversion or grinding of the Banjo bolt and Caliper, with some extreme cases the lower control arm, in order for a 15” wheel to properly fit.
- 275/50/15 or 28 x10” is the general recommended size for racing applications. Your proper tire size will be dictated by gearing and the power output of your vehicle.

Vehicle Fitment:
- 1994-2004 Mustang V6s
- 1994-2004 Mustang GTs
- 1996-2002 SVT Cobra Mustangs
- 2003-2004 Mach 1 Mustangs

Product Name: Cobra R 1995 Dished Wheel 17"x9" Black With Machined Lip 1994-2004
Description:
If you’re looking for the right modification to set off the exterior of your 1994-2004 Ford Mustang, then look no further! Wheels are perhaps the best way to improve the exterior of your vehicle. A new set of wheels has the potential to change the whole look of the car. These 17” x 9” 1995 Cobra R style wheels will look killer on any 1994-2004 Mustang!

The 1995 Cobra R Mustang is a legendary Mustang with a strong racing background. The wheels from this awesome machine are now timeless pieces of Mustang history. Key features of this wheel include the popular 5-spoke, dished design. Multiple phases are utilized to attain the wonderful finish on this wheel. The finishing process includes a black powder coat foundation followed by two layers of clear coat, not a one stage enamel. In fact, this is the correct process of wheel finishing. The lip of the wheel is then precision machined using a coolant and ceramic bit. This method creates a fine machined aluminum appearance on the lip of the wheel. An extra layer of clear coat is also applied which aids in the stunning finish of this wheel.

These 1995 Cobra R Wheels are available individually, as a complete set of four or within a wheel and tire package. The wheel and tire packages will come mounted and balanced, ready to bolt onto your Mustang.

Wheel Information
Size: 17" x 9"
Lugs: 5 x 4.5"
Finish: Black with Machined Lip
Offset: +24mm
Backspacing: 5.94"
Weight: 27.25 lbs.
Center Cap: Included

Please Note: Center caps are included with wheels. The factory center cap will also fit on this wheel. Lug nuts are NOT included with these wheels but the correct lug nuts are available through CJ Pony Parts.

Every system is constructed of premium austenitic stainless steel to give you the absolute best performance and durability. Fit and finish are perfect thanks to precision computer-controlled CNC manufacturing.

Product Name: MBRP Muffler Delete Axle-Back Exhaust System Stainless Steel 2-1/2" Pro Series GT 2005-2010/GT500 2007-2010
Description:
Make your GT or GT500 sound like a true muscle car with MBRP's axle-back exhaust system. Mufflers are deleted meaning there are no restrictions in the axle-back at all. MBRP designed their axle-back to maximize exhaust flow and minimize exhaust temperatures providing better fuel economy, performance and life expectancy.

This exhaust spent countless hours on the dyno and hundreds of miles on the street and track to ensure the best performance possible. When looking to purchase the best exhaust parts money can buy, look no further than the MBRP Pro Series. Using the best materials available, MBRP manufactures the Pro Series axle-back with T304 stainless steel. This austenitic exhaust tubing delivers optimal durability. The axle-back is polished to give off a mirror finish and look great exiting the rear of your Mustang with 4" tips. An MBRP performance exhaust system is the starting point to getting the most from cold air intakes, tuners and other bolt-ons.

Ford modular engines sound amazing and they are meant to be heard. MBRP's axle-back pumps up the decibels without making your ears ring. The axle-back is subtle and civilized during normal driving but seriously aggressive when you stomp on the go pedal. Restrictions are minimized by totally deleting the mufflers. The straight through tubes allow free flowing exhaust gas. Upgrading exhaust, especially the axle-back, is a top priority for Mustang owners.

MBRP offers the Pro Series for serious performance enthusiasts who demand the best of the best. Pro Series components are manufactured from T304 stainless steel. MBRP packs their Pro Series exhaust with the highest chromium and nickel content of any exhaust on the market, producing simply the best system money can buy. High quality stainless steel provides fantastic durability and will resist rusting. There is no better system than the MBRP Pro Series.

Order this MBRP Pro Series 2-1/2" Stainless Steel Muffler Delete Axle-Back Exhaust System for your 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009 or 2010 GT Mustang or your 2007, 2008, 2009 or 2010 GT500 Mustang from CJ Pony Parts today!

Product Name: Front Chin Spoiler GT500 2007-2009
Description:
Are you in the middle of doing a front-end conversion on your 05-09 V6 or GT and still need a few parts? Or maybe you are looking to replace your scraped, scratched and damaged OE front spoiler for your 2007-2009 Shelby GT500. Either way, this front chin spoiler will serve both purposes.

A front chin splitter helps redirect airflow across the lower front bumper and to the sides instead of letting it flow underneath the vehicle. This creates down force and eliminates the high speed front end lift associated with the air flowing underneath the car putting more weight down on the front tires.

Features and Benefits:
- Ford Replacement Part
- Original on the 07-09 Shelby GT500
- Replaces Damaged Shelby Parts
- Helps Complete V6 or GT Front End Conversion
- ABS Plastic with a Black Textured Finish

*Does NOT include any mounting hardware for installation.
*Fits 2007-2009 GT500 front bumper cover ONLY (NOT included).

Product Name: MagnaFlow Muffler Center/Offset 2-1/4"
Description:
Replace your car or truck's old muffler with this superior new alternative 2-1/4" Center/Offset Muffler from MagnaFlow. This MagnaFlow performance muffler was designed to increase the overall power of your Mustang and provide a deep, smooth sound.

MagnaFlow Performance mufflers are constructed of industrial-grade 16-guage stainless steel and uses lap-joint welds for a solid construction and rugged durability even in the most unforgiving conditions. Featuring a free-flowing, straight-through perforated stainless steel core, stainless mesh wrap and acoustical fiber fill to produce a smooth, resonating tone. Also included is a stainless steel mesh to provide sound dampening and all-welded, lap-jointed contacts to avoid sound distortion or splitting at the seams and joints.

MagnaFlow mufflers are packed of an acoustical material unlike most other vendor's products to ensure long life and no sound degradation throughout the lifetime of the muffler. These MagnaFlow mufflers feature a large-diameter, perforated stainless steel core and a straight-through design for an unrestricted flow of exhaust through the muffler.

Please Note: This MagnaFlow 2-1/4" muffler can be positioned either direction for additional customization during installation.

Researching aftermarket exhausts for vintage cars and trucks always seems to lead to a few common brands that have quality products and the most recognizable rumbles. Of these, MagnaFlow clearly leads the pack, with over 30 years of experience and some of the highest quality products on the market. CJ Pony Parts offers dozens of MagnaFlow products for any classic vehicle on the road, so check out their products and upgrade your exhaust today!

Order a new MagnaFlow (11225) 2-1/4" Center/Offset Muffler from CJ Pony Parts today!

Product Name: Roush Axle-Back Exhaust Stainless Steel GT 2015-2017
Garage Friendly Name: T304 Stainless Steel with 4" Chrome Tips
Description:
The Roush stainless steel axle-back exhaust (P/N: 421834) is designed to fit all 2015-2017 GT Mustangs and will offer every owner the opportunity to install one of the most popular systems in the market today!

Roush’s stainless steel axle-back exhaust is the segment of your exhaust system that sits behind the rear axle, which is how it gets its name. It can even give you that classic muscle car roar that you’ve always wanted for your high-performance Mustang. This axle-back exhaust from Roush will offer your 2015-2017 Mustang GT a distinct and aggressive sound. The highly tuned system will avoid the annoying drone or rasp that can occur with other competitive exhaust systems on the market. Needless to say, you will love the unmistakable sound and efficiency of your quality, new exhaust.

Backed By Popular Opinion and High-Quality Results

Constructed from 304 Stainless Steel, this axle back exhaust system features an exclusive open-chambered design that will not deteriorate over time, unlike conventional fiberglass packing material. The round exhaust tips are also made from stainless steel and finished with a unique process that provides heat resistance to color change. Like all Roush products, installation is quick, easy, and uses all factory hanger locations. The only necessary modification to the vehicle is that the factory exhaust will need to be cut off so that the new Roush axle-back can easily install with the provided clamps.

When you buy this axle-back exhaust, you get more than just a dependable exhaust system.

Features and Benefits:
- Fills OEM Ford Rear Valance
- Zero Impact on Emission Devices
- Straight-Thru Design Yields Higher Airflow and Performance 
- Full 304 Stainless Steel Construction
- Includes Clamps and Installation Instructions

*Installation requires cutting of the factory exhaust piping. Once the modifications have been made to the factory exhaust system, Installation is a simple bolt-in procedure.

Product Name: KONI Front Strut Adjustable Yellow Sport Mustang V6 2015-2017/ EcoBoost/ GT 2015-2022
Description:
The wait is finally over! Now is your chance to pick up this Yellow Sport Adjustable Front Strut (P/N: 8741 1589SPORT) from KONI for your 2015-2020 V6, EcoBoost or GT Mustang!

Features and Benefits:
- Exceptional Ride Quality
- Impressive Handling Improvements
- Externally Rebound Adjustable
- Re-Buildable and Re-Valveable
- Painted Yellow Exterior Finish
- Fits ALL V6, EcoBoost and GT Models
- Sold Individually

KONI Sport struts are the industry leader for user adjustable damping for daily drivers to weekend warriors. KONI Sport's familiar yellow color has for decades meant superior motion control and adjustability for the discerning driving enthusiast. KONI now offers S550 owners a carefully designed adjustable sport strut focused on extraordinary road handling, combined with an exceptional level of driving comfort. The KONI Yellow Sport Adjustable Front Strut can also be used with lowering spring kits that are designed lower your Mustang up to a 35mm.

Please Note: This strut is NOT designed to work with vehicles that are equipped with the factory MagneRide suspension.

*Ensure that all bump stops are re-fitted to ensure that no damage occurs to the valving should the damper bottom out.

Rebound Adjustment Procedure:
This strut is externally adjustable with a turn of a knob, a technique borrowed from Formula-1 racing where KONI dampers have dominated the field for years. One can switch back and forth, in most cases in a matter of seconds, from a comfortable "touring" setting to a more firm setting for a sporty drive. By means of the adjustment knob, damping forces can be altered to driving conditions or personal preferences.

Rebound Adjustment Direction:
Clockwise = Softer
Counter Clockwise = Firmer
Short Description: KONI Yellow Sport Adjustable Front Strut for 2015, 2016, and 2017 V6 Mustangs and 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 EcoBoost and GT Mustangs.

Product Name: KONI Special Active Front Strut Red Mustang V6 2015-2017/ EcoBoost/ GT 2015-2022
Description:
Get ready for premium shock-absorbing technology with their patented ACTIVE performance for your suspension system. Next time you're taking your pony for a spin, the latest advancement in KONI's product portfolio will have your Mustang ready to absorb shock and face corners head-on.

Features and Benefits:
- Technology Tested on 1.5 Million+ Factory Equipped Sports Cars
- Stability and Security for Comfortable Driving for Driver and Passenger
- Unrivaled Aftermarket Solution
- Driving Refinement for Mustangs
- Technology that Rivals Expensive Electronic Systems
- Improves Safety and Road Holding
- Sold Individually

KONI Special Active is the next generation of top-performing shock absorbers that offer superior handling without compromising comfort. Utilizing the most recent generation of KONI’s patented Frequency Selective Damping Technology (ACTIVE Technology), it controls large body motions and cornering forces but smooths expansion joints and rough roads for improved comfort. Frequency Selective Damping is the simplest and most economically sound avenue to substantially improve the driving characteristics of your GT, V6, or EcoBoost engine Mustang. 

The Frequency Selective Damping feature is a hydraulic amplifier that delays the buildup of pressure. There is an extra tuning option created in this generation of technology to achieve the finest combination of handling and comfort. KONI's technology does not require additional cables, sensors, or any other electronic devices that are needed to operate a Frequency Selective Damping damper since it is an integrated part of the hydraulic valve system inside the damper.

Please Note: This strut is NOT designed to work with vehicles that are equipped with the factory MagneRide suspension.

Tech Tip: Ensure that all bump stops are re-fitted to ensure that no damage occurs to the valving should the damper bottom out.
Short Description: KONI Red Special Active Front Strut for 2015, 2016, and 2017 V6 Mustangs and 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 EcoBoost and GT Mustangs.

KONI Sport Shocks have set the industry standard for user adjustable damping for daily drivers to weekend warriors. KONI Sport's recognizable yellow color has for decades signified superior motion control and adjustability for the perceptive driving aficionado. KONI now offers S550 owners a thoroughly designed adjustable sport shock focused on amazing road handling, combined with a remarkable level of driving comfort. The KONI Yellow Sport Adjustable Rear Shock can also be used with lowering spring kits that are intended lower your Mustang up to a 35mm.

This shock is externally adjustable with a turn of a knob, a technique borrowed from Formula-1 racing where KONI dampers have dominated the field for years. One can switch back and forth, in most cases in a matter of seconds, from a comfortable "touring" setting to a more firm setting for a sporty drive. By means of the adjustment knob, damping forces can be altered to driving conditions or personal preferences.

Rebound Adjustment Direction:
Clockwise = Softer
Counter Clockwise = Firmer

Description:

Features and Benefits:
- Technology Proven on over 1.5 Million Factory Equipped Vehicles
- Secure and Stable Feeling for Spirited Driving
- Unrivaled Aftermarket Solution
- Driving Refinement for Mustangs
- Technology that Rivals Expensive Electronic Systems
- Performance for Driver and Comfort for Passengers
- Improves Safety and Road Holding
- Sold Individually

The KONI (8245 1404) Red Special Active Rear Shock is a part of the next generation of premium shock absorbers, so you’re getting the newest technology that rivals electronic systems. You will notice a secure and stable feeling no matter how you’re driving in your S550.

KONI’s Frequency Selective Damping Technology (ACTIVE Technology) helps in controlling large body motions and cornering forces, and also smooths expansion joints and rough roads for superior comfort. KONI also added a special valve that is designed to control a parallel oil flow next to the one going through the piston. The Frequency Selective Damping feature closes the parallel oil flow, which then gives a rise in damping force nearly linear to the time the piston is moving in one direction.

Please Note: This shock is NOT designed to work with vehicles that are equipped with the factory MagneRide suspension.

Tech Tip: Ensure that all bump stops are re-fitted to ensure that no damage occurs to the valving should the damper bottom out.

Product Name: ACCELATEC Lowering Spring Set Mustang 2015-2022
Description:
ACCELATEC is here to help you get that "raked" look for your 2015-2022 Mustang with these lowering springs made specifically for us by a leading suspension manufacturer. These lowering springs were designed to give you an aggressive drop in the front and a moderate change in ride height in the rear. With a progressive front spring rate of 182-217 lbs/in and a linear rear spring rate of 799 lbs/in, you will easily maintain ride comfort but significantly increase overall handling and performance.

Features and Benefits:
- Ultra-High Performance and Fierce Appearance
- Excellent Ride Quality
- Corner Faster, Stop Quicker, and Handle More Precisely
- Improved Aerodynamic Efficiency
- Aggressive, Progressive Spring Design
- Drastically Lower Center of Gravity
- Virtually Eliminates Nose-Dive When Braking
- Reduces Squat During Acceleration
- Reduces Body Roll While Cornering

Some of the most iconic Mustangs known today all have one thing in common, and it’s that traditional muscle car stance. Not only does having the front end a little lower than the rear look great, but inherently has its benefits. Whether you’re on the street or the track, this setup can drastically help with weight transfer. With the end result being better traction and stability at speed.

Included:
- (2) Front Lowering Springs
- (2) Rear Lowering Springs
- (2) Front Bump Stops
- (2) Rear Bump Stops
- (2) Front Dust Boots

Lowering Specs:
- 1.5" Front and 1.0" Rear Drop for GT Fastback Mustang
- 1.0" Front and 1.0" Rear Drop for Ecoboost Fastback Mustang
- 1.6" Front and 1.1" Rear Drop for GT Convertible Mustang

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2015-2022 Mustang

Please Note: These springs will NOT fit vehicles that are equipped with the factory MagneRide suspension or 2018+ Performance Package 2 (PP2) Models.
