Product Name: Eibach Spring Pro-Kit Set Mustang GT 2015-2022
Description:
Eibach Pro-Kit springs are some of the best when it comes to lowering your 2015-2022 GT Mustang! These kits include some of the best springs that Eibach has ever made, along with compatible bump stops and dust boots so you can get everything you need in one package. That way, you can lower your ‘Stang’s center of gravity, improve its overall handling, and ride more comfortably all with one simple kit.

Features and Benefits:
- Proprietary, Progressive Spring Design
- 1.1” Front and 1.0” Rear Drop for GT Mustang
- Lower Center of Gravity
- Reduce Squat During Acceleration
- Limits Excessive Nose-Dive When Braking
- High Performance and Fierce Appearance
- Reduces Body Roll While Cornering
- Excellent Ride Quality
- Corner Faster, Stop Quicker and Handle More Precisely
- Improved Aerodynamic Efficiency

Eibach springs are some of the most popular products to use to lower your Mustang and get the handling you’ve always wanted. At CJ Pony Parts, we’re proud to offer the best possible prices on these high-quality, performance-crafted springs. If you want your 2015-2022 GT Mustang to stand apart from the rest of the herd, grab your Set of Four Eibach Pro-Kit Springs.

Front End Alignment Specifications:
- OE Camber: -0.8 deg (+/- 0.8 deg)
- OE Caster: 7.2 deg (+/- 0.8 deg)
- OE Toe: 0.0 deg (+/- 0.2 deg)
- Pro-Kit Camber: -1.0 deg
- Pro-Kit Caster: 7.5 deg
- Pro-Kit Toe: 0.2 deg

Rear End Alignment Specifications:
- OE Camber: -1.2 deg (+/- 0.8 deg)
- OE Caster: N/A
- OE Toe: 0.1 deg (+/- 0.2 deg)
- Pro-Kit Camber: -1.4 deg
- Pro-Kit Caster: N/A
- Pro-Kit Toe: 0.2 deg

This awesome spring system will dramatically improve your Mustang’s performance while simultaneously providing a new and aggressive stance! Eibach Pro-Kits are designed specifically for 2015-2022 GT Mustangs. Their durable, progressive, and responsive springs offer you more than handling too — they offer comfort. That means that you and your passengers can enjoy your ‘Stang when you’re hugging tight turns, instead of sliding to the side of your Mustang’s cab.

Lowering Specifications:
- 1.1" Front and 1.0" Rear Drop for GT and Bullitt Fastback Mustang
- 1.2" Front and 1.1" Rear Drop for GT Convertible Mustang

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2015-2022 Fastback and Convertible GT Mustang
- 2019-2020 Bullitt Mustang
*NOT designed for use with V6 or EcoBoost Mustangs.

Tech Tip: CJ Pony Parts recommends getting an alignment after installation to ensure your Mustang's specs are in check. Otherwise, your tires may wear improperly. If you check the manufacturer’s instructions below, alignment specifications are provided for your convenience.

Please Note: This kit does NOT fit GT or Bullitt models equipped with the Performance Pack Level 2 or the factory MagneRide Suspension; please see P/N: EBS34 (E10-35-029-07-22).
Short Description: Set of Four Eibach Pro-Kit Springs for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 GT Mustangs.

Product Name: Ford Performance Mach-1 Handling Pack Wheel 19" X 10.5"/ 19" X 11" Tarnished Dark Aluminum Set With TPMS Sensors Mustang 2015-2022
Description:
Your tires are waiting for the right set of wheels and Ford Performance includes the race-inspired Mach-1 Handling Pack to get your 2015-2022 Mustang fitted for strip/street speeds. This set of Tarnished Dark Aluminum 19" x 10.5" and 19" x 11" Mach-1 Handling Pack Wheels is staggered for optimal traction and handling at high speeds. This highly desired front-to-rear balance makes your Mustang ideal for street or strip applications. You can also clear big brake kits unlike before.

Wheels Specifications:
- Standard Equipment on 2021+ Mustang Mach 1 Handling Package
- Clears Factory 4-Piston and 6-Piston Brembo Brakes
- Staggered Size: 19” x 10.5” (Front) and 19” x 11” (Rear)
- Construction: Cast Aluminum
- Lugs: 5 x 114.3mm (5 x 4.5") Bolt Circle
- Center Bore: 70.6mm
- Finish: Tarnished Dark Painted Aluminum
- Backspacing: 6.69” (Front) and 7.89” (Rear)
- Offset: +24mm (Front) and +48mm (Rear)
- Center Caps: Included
- Made in the USA

Kit Includes:
- (2) 19" x 10.5" Front Wheels and (2) 19" x 11" Rear Wheels
- Set of Ford Performance Center Caps (P/N: M-1096-FP3)
- Ford Performance TPMS Sensors and Activation Tool Kit (P/N: M-1180-B)

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2015-2017 V6 Mustangs
- 2015-2022 EcoBoost Mustangs
- 2015-2022 GT Mustangs
*Also fits 2019+ Bullitt Mustang models.

Please Note:
- The M-1007K-MACH1H Wheels are intended for use only on vehicles originally equipped with the Mach 1 Handling Package and Performance Package 2 option. Use on other vehicles may result in tire-to-body/chassis clearance issues.
- The TPMS that are included with P/N: M-1007K-MACH1H are intended to be used with LHD (Left-Hand-Drive) North American spec vehicles ONLY. They are NOT compatible with RHD (Right-Hand-Drive) models or vehicles manufactured for distribution outside of North America.

Tech Tip: Please see P/N: M1007KMACH1H-B for the bundle options that include tires, lug nuts and other available wheel and tire package accessories. These wheels do not require small diameter, tuner style lug nuts. Larger OEM style lug nuts will work along with some of the other great factory bulge options that we have available. Designed for use with the factory recommended tire sizes - Front and Rear: 305/30-19.
Short Description: Set of Ford Performance Tarnished Dark Aluminum 19" x 10.5" and 19" x 11" Mach-1 Handling Pack Wheels with TPMS Sensors for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 Mustangs.

Product Name: Carroll Shelby Wheel Company CS-5 Wheel 19" X 11" Chrome Powder Mustang 2005-2022
Description:
Give your neighbors something to envy with a Carroll Shelby Wheel Company Chrome Powder 19" x 11" CS-5 Wheel upgrade on your 2005-2022 Mustang. The lightweight flow-formed aluminum construction forms a u-shaped curvy spoke face with a stunning chrome powder finish. Watch these metallic wheels reflect the sun as you cruise down the street!

The CS-21 was the inspiration for this CS-5 design that is offered in standard Mustang fitments. The CS-5 is available as a single wheel or staggered set of four 19" x 9.5" and 19" x 11" wheels. Featuring sharp, elegant lines and a lightweight flow-formed construction, the CS-5 has been independently tested in the USA to SAE J2530 safety and durability standards. The CS-5 is a Carroll Shelby officially licensed product that includes a 50mm offset and 7.97-inch backspacing that creates a thick and durable lip with excellent curb appeal.

Specifications:
- Size: 19" x 11"
- Lugs: 5 x 114.3mm (5 x 4.5")
- Finish: Chrome Powder
- Backspacing: 7.97"
- Offset: +50mm
- Center Bore: 70.7mm
- Construction: Flow-Formed Aluminum
- Weight: 24.5 lbs.
- Center Caps: Included

*This 19” x 11” wheel is designed for Rear Fitment only.

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2005-2017 V6 Mustangs
- 2007-2014 Shelby GT500 Mustangs
- 2015-2022 EcoBoost Mustangs
- 2005-2022 GT Mustangs

*Also fits Boss 302, Bullitt, and Mach-1 Mustang models.

Tech Tips:
- These wheels are not intended for use with 2015+ Shelby GT350/GT350R or 2020+ Shelby GT500 model Mustangs.
- For a forged version of this wheel that is designed specifically for use with 2015-2022 Shelby GT350 and GT350R model Mustangs, please see P/N: W1084-V and W1108-V.

*Valve stem TPMS compatible for all 2005-2022 Mustangs with a tire pressure sensor in each wheel (NOT Included).
*This 19" wheel will clear all available brake kits found on any of the 2005-2022 Mustang fitments mentioned in this listing.

Please Note: This wheel requires small diameter, tuner style lug nuts (NOT Included). Larger OEM-style lug nuts will not work.

Product Name: Velgen Wheels Lightweight Series VF5 Wheel 20" X 11" Gloss Bronze Mustang 2015-2022
Description:
The Velgen Wheels Gloss Bronze 20" X 11" Lightweight Series VF5 Wheel is constructed with 8.05" backspacing and 52MM offset to offer a bold look from any angle on your 2015-2022 Mustang. A gloss bronze finish complements the lightweight aluminum and upgrades your S550 to a true aftermarket look.

The Velgen Lightweight Series VF5 Wheels are designed in the USA using Flow Formed Technology. During construction, Velgen is able to add pressure to the inner barrel of the wheels after casting which causes the barrel to stretch while also compressing the aluminum. With this Flow Formed technology, it also increases the strength of the wheels while promoting weight reduction. The wheels are then sent through multiple CNC machining stages for a product that is ready to be finished in a durable powder coat that will create a unique appearance for just about any Mustang.

Specifications:
- Size: 20" x 11" (Rear Fitment Only)
- Lugs: 5 x 114.3mm (5 x 4.5")
- Finish: Gloss Bronze
- Backspacing: 8.05"
- Offset: ET52 (+52mm)
- Center Bore: 70.5mm (Does NOT Require Hub-Centric Rings)
- Construction: Flow Formed Aluminum
- Weight: 24 lbs.
- Center Caps: Included
- TÜV Approved

Additional Notes:
- Available individually or as a set of four with a staggered fitment. Please see P/N: W1136K-B for the bundle options that include tires, TPMS, lug nuts and other available wheel and tire package accessories.
- This wheel requires small diameter, tuner style lug nuts (NOT Included). Larger OEM-style lug nuts will not work.

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2015-2017 V6 Mustangs
- 2015-2022 EcoBoost Mustangs
- 2015-2022 GT Mustangs
*Also fits Bullitt and Mach-1 Mustang models.
*These wheels are not intended for use with 2015+ Shelby GT350/GT350R or 2020+ Shelby GT500 model Mustangs.
*Valve stem TPMS compatible for all 2015-2022 Mustangs with a tire pressure sensor in each wheel (NOT Included).
*This 20" wheel will clear all available brake kits found on any of the 2015-2022 Mustang fitments mentioned in this listing.

Tech Tip: The compatible tire sizes for these wheels can go from mild to aggressive with the available offset and width. It is highly recommended that you have all the proper equipment necessary so that your vehicle can have a proper wheel alignment done by a professional in both the front and the rear of your Mustang. You may also find the need for a pair of Steering Rack Limiters depending on the ride height of your Mustang and the tires you choose to install, See P/N: HW4093.
Short Description: Velgen Wheels Gloss Bronze 20" X 11" Lightweight Series VF5 Wheel for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 Mustangs.

Product Name: Roush Front Upper Grille Kit With ‘R’ Badge Gloss Black Mustang EcoBoost/ GT 2018-2022
Garage Friendly Name: Black Upper Grille Kit with 'R' Badge
Description:
Some might say the accessories make the car, and nothing complements the performance under your 2018-2022 EcoBoost or GT Mustang’s hood better than the grille that sits in front of it. The Roush Gloss Black Front Upper Grille Kit with ‘R’ Badge features an aggressive front-end appearance with a high-gloss black finish and the signature ‘R’ badge to call out Roush, the performance masters.

Features and Benefits:
- Aggressive Front-End Appearance
- Durable Injection Molded ABS Plastic Construction
- High-Gloss Black Finish
- Includes Signature Roush “R” Badge
- Designed with OEM CAD Data for Precision Fitment
- Installation Utilizes Factory Front Grille Mounting Locations
- Larger Opening High-Flow Design Helps with Cooling
- Includes All Necessary Hardware
- Made in the USA

Roush understands that it’s not always about looks. That’s why they engineered the opening of the grille to be larger than the original, increasing airflow to your radiator and keeping your engine coolant at optimal temperatures.

Utilizing the latest OEM computer-aided design data (CAD), this grille is cut to the precise measurements of the original designs from Ford. This guarantees the grille will have the exact same fit as the original, even utilizing the stock mounts for a direct swap.

When it comes to durability, you can rest easy knowing that the grille is constructed from injection-molded ABS right here in the USA.

Please Note: The Front Upper Grille Kit is NOT designed for use with the Mach-1 or any Shelby model Mustangs.
Short Description: Roush Gloss Black Front Upper Grille Kit with ‘R’ Badge for 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 EcoBoost and GT Mustangs.

This shiny, glossy black emblem stands out way more than that factory-original chrome plated emblem and makes the overall style of your Mustang more aggressive. Get with the program and order yours today!</p> <p> <strong>Features and Benefits:</strong><br />- Glossy black finish<br />- Constructed of durable ABS plastic<br />- Includes 3M adhesive<br />- Installs into OEM locations on upper grille<br />- Replaces OEM factory chrome emblem <br />- Install is easy--no modifications required</p> <p><strong>Please Note</strong>: This Front Grille Pony Emblem is also available in Matte Black (GO37).</p> <p>Made of high-quality ABS plastic, this gloss black emblem will easily install onto your Mustang's front grille with no modifications--just use the provided 3M adhesive in your OEM factory locator holes and press this emblem on. Product Name: ACCELATEC Exterior Mirror Covers Carbon Fiber Pair US-Spec Without Turn Signal Mustang 2015-2022
Garage Friendly Name: USDM Carbon Fiber Exterior Mirror Covers

Product Name: MagnaFlow Cat-Back Exhaust System Overland Series 2/4 Door 2.7L Bronco 2021-2022
Description:
When it’s time to upgrade the exhaust of your 2 and 4 Door 2021-2022 2.7L Broncos, MagnaFlow has you covered with their Overland Series Cat-Back Exhaust System. This system is CNC machined out of stainless steel right here in the USA and is designed to be a direct fit replacement for the factory system. The system fits closer to the undercarriage, increasing ground clearance when off-roading. The Overland uses a tunable resonator to eliminate unwanted noise per the user’s preferences while enhancing the sound of the engine with MagnaFlow’s signature deep-throated sound.

Features and Benefits:
- Direct Bolt-On Replacement
- CNC Machined Stainless Steel Construction
- Higher Ground Clearance When Off-Roading
- Tunable Resonator To Eliminate Unwanted Noises
- Fits Both 2 And 4 Door Variants of the 2.7L Bronco
- Made in the USA
Short Description: MagnaFlow Overland Series Cat-Back Exhaust System for 2 and 4 Door 2021-2022 2.7L Broncos.

Product Name: Flowmaster Axle-Back Exhaust American Thunder Series Stainless Steel Bronco 2021-2022

Flowmaster produces exhaust systems renowned by enthusiasts and racers alike. These American Thunder Axle-Backs are a direct-fit performance upgrade, that brings out the aggression in your 2021-2022 Bronco. 

Features and Benefits:
- 3.00-inch mandrel bent tubing
- 16-gauge 409 stainless steel
- A 3.00-inch polished stainless steel tips
- A tuned 60 Series performance muffler
- Deep aggressive to moderate performance tone
- Delta Flow Technology Increases Performance and Reduces Drone

This system uses a tuned 60 Series style muffler for a moderately aggressive exhaust tone and increased performance. Maximum dyno gains of 19 hp and 19 lb-ft. were measured at the rear wheels.

3" mandrel bent 409 stainless steel tubing is used to maximize exhaust flow and durability. A polished 3.00-inch stainless steel tip is used to add a custom touch. All of the necessary hardware is included and factory mounting locations are used.
Short Description: Flowmaster American Thunder Series Stainless Steel Axle-Back Exhaust for 2021-2022 Broncos.

- Offset: 0

- For 1967-1968, 225/60-14 tires are recommended with 14x7" wheels.
- For 1969-1973, 235/60-14 tires are recommended with 14x7" wheels.

Product Name: Borla Cat-Back Exhaust System ATAK Stainless Steel 2-1/2" Mustang GT 2005-2009
Description:
This 2-1/2" Stainless Steel Cat-Back Exhaust System (140382) features Borla's newest and most aggressive ATAK mufflers to make your 2005-2009 GT Mustang roar! Unlike other loud exhaust systems, Borla's Cat-Back produces the highest available decibel levels while retaining clarity of sound and avoiding distortion. 

Borla appropriately named this technology Acoustically-Tuned Applied Kinetics (ATAK). The system features a straight-through baffled design, and it is manufactured from aircraft-quality T-304 stainless steel. Full 2-1/2" mandrel-bent piping leads to 4"x12" round rolled tips that exit the rear of the vehicle.

Features and Benefits:
- Round, Rolled Exhaust Tips
- Distinctive Borla Sound
- 2-1/2-inch Mandrel Bent Piping
- Aircraft Quality T-304 Stainless Steel 
- Unleashes Hidden Horsepower

Upgrading to the Borla cat-back increases exhaust velocity to add horsepower, driving excitement, fuel economy and the distinctive Borla sound. Borla cat-back exhaust systems feature patented, straight-through and multi-core technology to unleash hidden horsepower. Ultra-smooth mandrel bends ensure maximum flow and power. Every system is constructed of premium austenitic stainless steel to give you the absolute best performance and durability. Fit and finish are perfect thanks to precision computer-controlled CNC manufacturing.
Short Description: Borla 2-1/2" Stainless Steel ATAK Cat-Back Exhaust System for 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008 and 2009 GT Mustangs.

Product Name: MBRP Axle-Back Exhaust System 2-1/2" Aluminized Series GT 2005-2010/GT500 2007-2010
Garage Friendly Name: 2.5" Armor Lite Axle-Back Exhaust w/ 3.5" Tips
Description:
Upgrading exhaust, especially the axle-back, is a top priority for Mustang owners. Ford modular engines sound amazing and we want to hear them. MBRP's axle-back pumps up the decibels without making your ears ring. The axle-back is subtle and civilized during normal driving and seriously aggressive when you stomp on the go pedal!

Make your GT or GT500 sound like a true muscle car with MBRP's axle-back exhaust system. While designing this exhaust, MBRP spent countless hours on the dyno and hundreds of miles on the street and track to ensure the best performance possible. MBRP designed their axle-back to maximize exhaust flow and minimize exhaust temperatures providing better fuel economy, performance and life expectancy. Heavy duty aluminized steel axle-backs offer a value price without compromising on the quality. This axle-back is finished off with a set of polished to stainless steel 3-1/2” tips that will look great exiting the rear of your S197 Mustang.

Features and Benefits:
- Designed to Maximize Exhaust Flow
- Subtle and Drone-Free
- Aggressive Exhaust Note When Needed
- Aluminized Heavy Gauge Steel
- Stainless Steel 3-1/2" Polished Tips
- Includes All Necessary Hardware and Clamps 

*Requires NO cutting or welding.

The Aluminized Series exhaust systems from MBRP are made from 100% heavy gauge aluminized steel. The main focus of the Aluminized Series is to provide the cost conscious consumer with the same high quality design and craftsmanship as MBRP's other systems but at a value price. Aluminized axle-backs are suitable for areas with moderate environmental conditions. For those needing an exhaust system that can handle the harshest road conditions, a step up to the XP Series would be in order.

Order the MBRP Aluminized Series 2-1/2" Axle-Back Exhaust System for your 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009 or 2010 Mustang GT or 2007, 2008, 2009 or 2010 Shelby GT500 Mustang from CJ Pony Parts today!

Description:
Roush completely redesigned their Extreme Axle-Back for maximum performance and a more aggressive growl! The Extreme axle-back exhaust from Roush uses 409 aluminized stainless steel for durability and corrosion resistance. With a full mandrel bent construction that extends from the axle to the 4 inch chrome 304 stainless steel dual wall tips for minimal flow restriction. Roush also took inspiration from their 2015 Mustang exhaust systems when they designed this axle-back for your 2005-2010 Mustang GT or 2007-2010 Shelby GT500.

The straight through design is less restrictive and gives this exhaust a tough, guttural sound unique to Roush exhausts. Although the extreme sound of this axle-back may not be for everyone, it’s by far one of the best sounding stand-alone axle-back exhaust on the market today. And at a price that will easily allow everyone to know you are driving something special.

Features and Benefits:
- Totally Redesigned for Improved Performance
- Straight-through Resonator Design
- 409 Aluminized Stainless Steel
- Full Mandrel Bent Tubing
- 4" Flash-chromed 304 Stainless Steel Dual Wall Tips
- Uses OEM Hangars and Mounting Points

*Requires NO cutting or welding.

This kit will use all stock mounting points and comes with the hangars pre-welded. Absolutely no cutting or custom fabrication is required for a perfect fit. All Roush exhausts use CAD data from the original manufacturer in the design process. This ensures perfect, OEM quality fitment and painless installation each and every time.

Product Name: JLT Performance Cold Air Intake Kit Black Textured Mustang GT 2018-2022
Garage Friendly Name: Black Textured Cold Air Intake Kit
Description:
The 2018-2022 GT Mustang utilizes a 5.0L Ti-VCT V8 engine which is proving to be the best engine Ford has put out yet. A new dual-fuel, high-pressure direct injection, and low-pressure port fuel injection translates into 460HP and higher-RPM power at 420lb-ft of torque. An engine, though, is only as good as the parts it is connected to, so boost your GT even further by adding JLT Performance's Black Textured Cold Air Intake Kit (P/N: CAI-FMG-18) specifically designed to fit your 2018-2022 GT Mustang.

Features and Benefits:
- OEM-Style Black Textured Plastic Construction
- Computer Designed to Optimize Space
- Made in the USA
- Fits 2018-2022 GT Mustangs

This cold air intake, available at CJ Pony Parts, will provide more power and enhanced performance to the 5.0L V8 engine in your GT. It's computer-designed for optimized fit in the engine bay. The intake is constructed from OEM-style black textured plastic that's unpainted for a sleek, modern style under your hood. The kit comes complete with everything you need to completely replace your factory intake without any adjustments. It includes a JLT plastic intake tube with 120mm MAF size, a silicone reducer coupler, a heat shield with duct and weatherstrip, heavy-duty clamps, and all the necessary installation hardware.

Also included is a top-of-the-line S&B Powerstack air filter made to exact specifications for perfect fit and function. The filter has a tapered design and Powerstack filtered ends, with a 5" opening on the tube, so it can handle the large air filter needed for this intake. In the end, you get a huge 5" x 7" air filter that includes a built-in screen for straighter airflow as it passes through the precisely placed and molded 120mm MAF area. JLT designed this intake system for bolt-on installation, so no permanent modifications are necessary to use the kit and upgrade your S550's performance.

This Kit Includes:
- Plastic Intake Tube - 120mm MAF Size
- Silicone Reducer Coupler
- S&B Powerstack 5"x7" Air Filter
- Heat Shield with Duct and Weatherstrip
- Heavy Duty Clamps and Installation Hardware

*A custom tune is required with this intake (not included).

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2018-2022 GT Mustang
Short Description: JLT Performance Black Textured Cold Air Intake Kit for 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021 and 2022 GT Mustangs.

Product Name: Injen Cold Air Intake System Evolution Mustang GT 5.0L 2018-2022
Description:
If you’ve been waiting for cold air intake systems to take the next step in product evolution the time to stop twiddling your thumbs in anxious anticipation is upon you. This Injen (EVO9202) Evolution Cold Air Intake System for your GT Mustang with a 5.0L V8 Engine will deliver the horsepower and pounds per feet of torque gains you’re looking for.

Features and Benefits:
- Dyno Proven gains of up to 26 horsepower and 23 pounds per feet of torque
- Designed to work with the stock calibration
- Aggressive intake growl under acceleration
- Durable Roto-Molded Polyethylene housing and intake tube
- Fully functioning, forward facing ram air scoop
- Reinforced automotive grade silicone couplers
- Fully serviceable Injen SuperNano-Web dry air filter
- Stainless steel band clamps with inner protective liner
- Aggressive under hood appearance while maintaining an OE fit
- Made in the USA

Specifically engineered for the 2018-2022 Ford Mustang GT with the 5.0L engine, this intake system is made in the USA from cross-linked high-density polyethylene for enhanced strength and extreme durability. To provide fresh, clean air to your engine, the box has a forward-facing ram air scoop. Additionally, this intake system also includes stainless steel hardware and automotive grade urethane couplers. Easily installed, no cutting or drilling is required for an easy installation process and it does not require aftermarket tuning for the gains you’re looking for.

Precisely tuned and tested on Injen’s in-house dyno, this system replicates stock fueling. This system features a patent-pending twist-lock system that works to ease the installation process while securing the massive SuperNano-Web dry air filter.

This intake also includes a built-in filter monitor for quick and easy filter inspections, a smooth rotational molded induction tube for reduced restriction levels and premium installation hardware. All in all, with this aftermarket upgrade applied to your pony you’ll see horsepower gains of 26HP and a 23 pounds per feet of torque boost.

Please Note: This item is not CARB (California Air Resource Board) exempt and is not legal for sale or use in the state of California.
Short Description: Injen Evolution Cold Air Intake System for 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 GT Mustangs with a 5.0L V8 Engine.

Product Name: Eibach Spring Sportline Set Mustang Fastback/ Convertible GT 2015-2022/ Bullitt 2019-2020
Description:
Are you looking for that fierce, lowered look on your 2015-2022 GT or 2019-2020 Bullitt Mustang? Grab a set of these Eibach Sportline Springs from CJ Pony Parts. This stellar spring system will drastically change your Mustang into an all-out handling machine while also giving it that aggressive stance.

Features and Benefits:
- Aggressive, Progressive Spring Design
- Drastically Lower Center of Gravity
- Virtually Eliminates Nose-Dive When Braking
- Reduces Squat During Acceleration
- Reduces Body Roll While Cornering
- Ultra-High Performance and Fierce Appearance
- Excellent Ride Quality
- Corner Faster, Stop Quicker and Handle More Precisely
- Improved Aerodynamic Efficiency

These high-quality springs will reduce squat during acceleration, limit nose-dive while braking and reduce body roll on those hard corners. You will also see a reduction in fender-well clearance, making your Mustang look just as impressive as it performs when you install these versatile new Eibach Sportline Springs.

By using an advanced progressive spring design, these performance springs provide the ultimate balance to take your passion for driving to a whole new level. The lowered ride height helps to distribute road stresses evenly and provide an improved ride quality. When combined with Plus-1 or Plus-2 wheels and tires, the Eibach Sportline Springs become that extra special touch for all-out performance and appearance results in your 2015-2022 Mustang!

As everyone has learned from racing and independent testing, lowering your vehicle’s ride height improves the aerodynamic efficiency by forcing more air over the car and less underneath, where most of the drag is found, resulting in higher top speeds on the track and better MPG on the highway.

Lowering Specs:
- 1.5" Front and 1.3" Rear Drop for GT and Bullitt Fastback Mustang
- 1.6" Front and 1.4" Rear Drop for GT Convertible Mustang

Please Note: These springs will NOT fit vehicles that are equipped with the factory MagneRide suspension or 2018-2021 Performance Package Models.

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2015-2022 Fastback and Convertible GT Mustang
- 2019-2020 Bullitt Mustang
*NOT designed for use with V6 or EcoBoost Mustangs.

Tech Tip: CJ Pony Parts recommends getting an alignment after installation to ensure your Mustang's specs are in check. Otherwise, your tires may wear improperly. If you check the manufacturer’s instructions below, alignment specifications are provided for your convenience.

Front End Alignment Specifications:
- OE Camber: -0.8 deg (+/- 0.8 deg)
- OE Caster: 7.2 deg (+/- 0.8 deg)
- OE Toe: 0.0 deg (+/- 0.2 deg)
- Sportline Camber: -1.2 deg
- Sportline Caster: 7.5 deg
- Sportline Toe: 0.2 deg

Rear End Alignment Specifications:
- OE Camber: -1.2 deg (+/- 0.8 deg)
- OE Caster: N/A
- OE Toe: 0.1 deg (+/- 0.2 deg)
- Sportline Camber: -1.6 deg
- Sportline Caster: N/A
- Sportline Toe: 0.2 deg
Short Description: Set of Four Eibach Sportline Springs for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021 and 2022 Fastback and Convertible GT Mustangs and 2019 and 2020 Bullitt Mustangs.

Product Name: Carroll Shelby Wheel Company CS-21 Forged Front Wheel 19"X10.5" Brushed Aluminum With Gloss Clear GT350/GT350R 2015-2020
Description:
The wheels that come on the 2015-2020 Shelby GT350 and GT350R straight from the factory are great looking wheels. But, if you are looking to change up the style of your S550 Shelby with some high-quality aftermarket wheels, then this Carroll Shelby Wheel Company Brushed Aluminum with Gloss Clear 19" CS-21 Forged Wheel from CJ Pony Parts is just what you are looking for.

This CS-21 Forged Wheel from Carroll Shelby Wheel Company has an “Alcoa-Style” appearance that draws inspiration from the wheels previously used in the S197 Super Snake program. It features a split 5-spoke design with machined “Shelby” and “GT350” logos around the outer rim of the wheel and is finished with a “Shelby” logo center cap. With a forged aluminum construction, the CS-21 wheel is extremely lightweight at 26 lbs. for the front wheel and 27.5 lbs. for the rear, yet has excellent strength and durability. The finish of the wheel is a raw, brushed aluminum finished in a gloss clear coat that is both aggressive and elegant in appearance. The 19" x 10.5" wheel has a specific front fitment, with the 19" x 11" wheel having a specific rear fitment and are not interchangeable.

Wheel Information:
- Size: 19" x 10.5" and 19” x 11”
- Lugs: 5 x 114.3mm (5 x 4.5")
- Finish: Raw Brushed Aluminum with Gloss Clear Coating
- Backspacing: 6.93" and 8.36”
- Offset: +30mm and +60mm
- Center Bore: 70.7mm
- Construction: Forged Aluminum with Machined ‘Shelby’ and ‘GT350’ Logos on Outer Rim
- Weight: 26 lbs. and 27.5 lbs.
- Center Caps: Included and Features ‘Shelby’ Logo
- Valve Stem TPMS Compatible

Please Note: This wheel is NOT intended for use with 2015-2020 V6, EcoBoost or GT Mustangs.

*Requires small diameter lug nuts, the OEM GT350 and GT350R lug nuts are NOT compatible.

*These wheels have specific Front and Rear fitments and are NOT interchangeable.

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2015-2020 Shelby GT350 Mustang
- 2015-2020 Shelby GT350R Mustang

Tech Tip: Designed for use with the factory recommended tire sizes - Front: 295/35-19 and Rear: 305/35-19.
Short Description: Carroll Shelby Wheel Company Brushed Aluminum with Gloss Clear 19" x 10.5" CS-21 Forged Front Wheel for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019 and 2020 Shelby GT350 and GT350R Mustangs.

Product Name: JMS Rear Wheel Avenger Series 17" X 10" With Lug Nuts Polished Finish Mustang 2015-2022
Description:
Stock wheels aren't winners at the dragstrip. For improved ETs and looks to match, JMS has the answer. These Avenger Series Rear Wheels (A1710721FP) are optimized to fit your wheelwells, with a lightweight and race-ready design. These rear wheels are perfect for running wider tires.

- Utilizes Oem-Type Conical Seat Lug Nuts Just Like The Factory
- High-Quality OEM Finish for Great Looks and Durability

These 5-spoke wheels feature an inner lip to distribute forces to the entire wheel, branded center caps, and matching lug nuts. Their one-piece cast aluminum construction is lightweight, but built tough for racing applications.

- Finish: Polished
- Backspacing: 7.21"
- Offset: +44.00mm

- Instructions

- Fits Rear Only
- Does NOT fit Shelby GT350 and GT500 Models

Description:
Customize your 2005-2022 Mustang with a bold aftermarket wheel for the ultimate in strength and style. The Voxx 20" X 9" Lumi is a dynamic one-piece wheel developed using advanced feather forged technology and coated in a stealthy matte black finish.

Product Name: BBK Cold Air Intake Kit Fenderwell Chrome GT 1996-2004
Description:
Get rid of the restrictive air box on your 1996-2004 GT Mustang's 4.6L 2V engine and upgrade to BBK's Chrome Fenderwell Cold Air Intake Kit from CJ Pony Parts! Considered to be one of the most popular bolt-on modifications in the automotive industry, BBK's cold air intake systems are designed to deliver great looks under the hood as well as providing actual horsepower gains.

Features and Benefits:
- Washable, High-Flow Conical Air Filter
- Beautiful Chrome Plated Intake Tubes
- Blue Silicone Hose Couplers
- Stainless Steel Band Clamps
- All Necessary Hardware and Detailed Instructions
- Improves Horsepower, Torque and Fuel Mileage
- Direct Replacement for Factory Air Box
- Simple Installation with Basic Hand Tools
- Made in the USA

As the originator of the first of these systems back in the early nineties, the famous BBK line continues to offer the leading edge quality and function that BBK customers expect. Each cold air intake model has been designed and dyno tested at the BBK headquarters in Southern California to maximize performance.

This BBK cold air intake system utilizes a high-flow conical air filter that is made with a long lasting cotton element. This kit is designed with the air filter located inside of the fenderwell instead of inside the engine bay. By placing the filter in the fenderwell you get cooler air flow for increased horsepower and throttle response.

*This Cold Air Intake Kit is 50-state smog legal: CARB D-245-14

Upgrading your SN95 Mustang for more power can always be a challenge. Most every owner wants to install the best possible parts that are available for the least cost. However, with parts from BBK Performance, you will get extremely high quality products for your Mustang that are available at a very reasonable cost. CJ Pony Parts offers a huge variety of parts from BBK Performance so you can give your Mustang the performance boost it deserves.

Order a BBK Chrome Fenderwell Cold Air Intake Kit for your 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003 or 2004 GT Mustang from CJ Pony Parts today!

Product Name: Rampage Halogen Headlight Conversion Kit Clear With Round H4 55/ 60W Bulbs Universal
Description:
Dreaming of a brighter beam that's also street legal? Simply select an SAE/DOT approved lighting package like this Universal Halogen Headlight Conversion Kit (5089925) from Rampage. The kit features clear glass lenses, an advanced multi-surface reflector and round H4 55/60W bulbs. However, the Headlights can also accept off-road bulbs up to 130 watts.

Features and Benefits:
- Plug-and-Play Installation 
- SAE/DOT Approved 
- Replaceable H4, 12V 55/60 Watt Bulbs
- For Factory-Sealed Beam Applications 

When combined, the reflectors and lenses create a 45 percent more luminous beam on low beam and 30 percent more luminous beam on high beam than conventional "throw-away" headlights. Overall, the Headlights produce a 60 percent brighter output than conventional OEM sealed beam headlamps. 

No modifications are required to complete this lighting upgrade—just simple, direct plug-and-go installation for most factory-sealed beam applications. And, the factory harness and hardware found on most street applications remain compatible with this Halogen Conversion Kit.
Short Description: Rampage Clear Universal Halogen Headlight Conversion Kit with Round H4 55/60W Bulbs.

Product Name: Oracle Lighting LED Headlight Bulb V Series 9007 Pair 1994-2004
Description:
As far as LED lights for Mustangs go, Oracle Lighting is a leading brand. Their V-Series (V5241-001) LED headlight bulbs are an amazing value for the quality and features they provide. If you want the crisp look of 6000k LEDs for your SN95 Mustang, or just want brighter headlights, this kit is the way to go.

Features and Benefits:
- These bulbs are sold as a pair
- Only DOT compliant “street legal” LED head light conversion available
- First 6-volt daytime running light compatible LED bulb available
- LED bulb features precision filament geometry for no-glare illumination
- No fan, heat sink, or external cooling system necessary
- Installs into your SN95’s factory headlight housings with OEM fitment

V-Series bulbs utilize Flip-Chip Scale LED Packaging, a modern design which allows for slimmer LED bulbs with more powerful outputs. These bulbs are compact enough to imitate your original halogen units, all while lighting your SN95 Mustang exponentially better. Their ergonomic and compact profile makes install easier and keeps bulb temperatures lower.

Oracle V-Series bulbs also feature Active Thermal Regulation (ATR) temperature management. A driver integrated into the bulb can detect if temperatures are climbing toward an upper limit and will reduce voltage to stabilize bulb temperature. This feature prolongs bulb life and doesn’t significantly affect brightness levels. Because thermal properties are improved, these lights require no external thermal regulation. The heat sinks, metal ribbons, or cooling fans seen on other LED conversions are all unnecessary with these Oracle lights.

The V-Series bulb is also compatible with daytime dimmer light functions and can reduce brightness to 50% in a daytime mode just like a halogen bulb. Plus, they won’t flicker in this mode as other LEDs are prone to do.

Thanks to smart technology and design, these Oracle (V5241-001) LED bulbs will make your SN95 Mustang shine brighter and look great doing it.

Bulb Specifications:
- Bulb Type: 9007
- Color Temp: 6000K
- Input Voltage: 6-32V DC
- DRL Compatible: Yes
- Power Draw: 17W/ Bulb
- Lumens: 3,600LM/ Set
- Efficacy: >100lm/W*
   *Industry-Leading Efficacy Ratio
Short Description: Pair of Oracle Lighting V Series 9007 LED Headlight Bulbs for 1994, 1995, 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003 and 2004 Mustangs.

Product Name: FORM Lighting Sequential LED Taillights Clear Lens Mustang 2015-2022
Garage Friendly Name: Sequential LED Taillights w/ Clear Lenses
Description:
FORM Lighting Sequential LED Taillights bring vibrant lighting performance to your Mustang. Premium lighting pays off. Not only will these taillights shine brighter for increased visibility, their premium construction and appearance will be evident to anyone on the road. What's more, you can option these lights with your choice of lenses, to match the body color and other style choices.

Features and Benefits:
- Full LED Taillight Replacements
- Available with Clear, Smoked or Red Lenses
- Stand out from the crowd
- OEM-Grade Construction

The S550 is known for its signature triple sequential turn signal. These lamps not only retain that functionality, but make your Mustang stand out with modern 2018+ styling, and three different lens colors available: smoked, clear, or OEM red.

Red is a great option for 2015-2017 Mustangs looking to update their taillights to the more aggressive styling of the 2018+, while keeping the OEM red appearance. Smoked offers a dark appearance, great on black and grey vehicles. Clear is Perfect for white and silver vehicles, the clear lens option is a brighter look, while still providing distinct “Euro” styling.

FORM Lighting taillights are built with quality in mind and constructed using OEM-grade materials, including a UV-coated polycarbonate lens, automotive-grade LEDs and optics, and direct-fit connectors. While they may not be the cheapest option on the market, the fit and finish of FORM lamps is superior to other aftermarket units.

All three lens color options illuminate with red LEDs for running lights, turn signal, and brake. They are SAE and DOT-compliant for on-road use. These taillights for the Mustang are completely plug-and play and will fit perfectly, without any body gaps. Installation is a breeze and can be done in minutes.

They were designed to plug into your factory tail light connector, with no additional wiring needed. There are no errors, flickering, or hyper-flashing.

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2015-2017 V6 Mustang
- 2015-2022 EcoBoost Mustang
- 2015-2022 GT Mustang (Including Bullitt and Mach-1 models)
- 2015-2020 Shelby GT350/GT350R Mustang
- 2020-2022 Shelby GT500 Mustang
*Fits Fastback and Convertible models.

Tech Tip: The design and shape of the lenses are reminiscent of the taillights found on only the 2018-2022 models; however, these taillight assemblies will fit ALL North American model S550 Mustangs.
Tech Tip 2: The plastic trim pieces on the upper portion of the factory lights will have to be removed and transferred over to the Form Lighting Taillights in order to properly complete installation.

Please Note: These taillights will ONLY work on North American model Mustangs; they are NOT compatible with models meant for distribution outside of North America.
Short Description: Pair of FORM Lighting Sequential LED Taillights with Clear Lenses for 2015-2022 Mustangs.

Product Name: CJ Classic Trucks Peep Mirror 4” Curved Arm
Description:
Searching for a way to give your vehicle a custom yet subtle touch? This CJ Classic Trucks 4” Curved Arm Peep Mirror is made out of a beautiful, polished stainless steel mirror head and chrome post. If there is a “lip” of metal, you can mount this mirror for an easy install. A set of two screws holds the mirror and the necessary hex wrench is included.

Features & Benefits:
- Polished stainless steel
- Chromed arm and mounting base
- Easy install with set screws and supplied hex wrench
- Mount to door edge or any “lip” of metal

Vehicle Fitment:
- 1960-1987 C10
- 1966-1977 Bronco
- 1948-1979 F100
Short Description: CJ Classic Trucks 4” Curved Arm Peep Mirror.

Product Name: DV8 Offroad Spare Tire Delete With Lights/ Camera Mount Bronco 2021-2022
Garage Friendly Name: Spare Tire Delete w/ Lights/Camera Mount
Description:
The DV8 Offroad Spare Tire Delete (TSBR-01) is a great way to clean up the look of your Bronco’s tailgate. The delete covers the spare tire assembly and provides a factory specification license plate mount, license plate light mount, backup camera mount, and third brake light mount. Installation requires only basic wiring, and all the necessary hardware is included. This spare tire delete is a great way to improve the look of your vehicle and make it more functional at the same time.

Features and Benefits:
- Replaces spare tire assembly
- Cleans up the look of the tailgate
- License plate mount
- OEM license plate light mount
- OEM Backup camera mount
- OEM Third brake light mount
- Hardware is included
- Easy installation with only basic wiring required

Please Note: 90-inches of 16–18-gauge wiring is needed for the license plate light but is not included.

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2021-2022 Broncos
Short Description: DV8 Offroad Spare Tire Delete with Lights and Camera Mount for 2021 and 2022 Broncos.

Product Name: Rigid Industries Triple Fog Light With SR-M Lights for Steel Bumpers Bronco 2021-2022
Garage Friendly Name: Steel Bumper SR-M Triple Fog Light Kit
Description:
Rigid Industries' Triple Fog Light kit features SR-M LED Lights to increase the light output on your 2021-2022 Ford Bronco. This kit was made specifically for models with metal bumpers for the best fitment possible. The included brackets and mounts feature a stainless steel construction and a black powder coating for protection from the elements.

Features and Benefits:
- Stainless Steel Construction
- UV and Abrasion Resistant Powder Coat
- Includes SR-M Driving, Spot and Diffused Optics
- Penetrating Uniform Light Beams
- Harnesses and Connectors included
- Direct-Fit Design and Installation

The SR-M LED lights include spot and diffused optics for uniform beams of lights and stronger penetration through harsh weather conditions. Rigid's custom-fit design does not require any modifications to your factory metal bumper. The kit comes with all the necessary hardware and harnesses for a smooth installation.

Please Note: For use in the Ford Performance Heavy Duty Modular Bumper for 2021+ Ford Bronco
Short Description: Rigid Industries Triple Fog Light With SR-M Lights for 2021 and 2022 Broncos with Steel Bumpers.

Product Name: Anchor Room Quarter Window Decal Set Tattered Support Flag Reflective Black Mustang Fastback 2015-2022
Garage Friendly Name: Black Reflective Tattered Support Flag Decals
Description:
When it comes to S550 Mustang vinyls, Anchor Room is a top tier manufacturer. These Anchor Room (15FM_QWF) Tattered Support Flag Quarter Window Decals add patriotic flair to your late model Mustang, and come in a variety of colors to suit your preferences.

Features and Benefits:
- Complete Two Piece Kit
- Choice of Several Vinyl Color Options
- For Driver and Passenger Sides
- Computer Cut for a Perfect Fit
- High-Quality Eight Year Outdoor Vinyl
- Made in the USA

This Kit Includes:
- One (1) Piece for Driver Side
- One (1) Piece for Passenger

*Will NOT Fit Convertibles models.

Please Note: Although this product can be an easy DIY installation with patience and the proper tools, we highly recommend that installation is completed by a professional. Tools that may be needed to successfully complete the installation of this item yourself are as follows: Application Fluid, a Spray Bottle, Squeegee, Microfiber Towel and possibly a Heat Gun.
Short Description: Set of Anchor Room Reflective Black Tattered Support Flag Quarter Window Decals for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 Fastback Mustangs.

Product Name: Anchor Room Hood Vinyl Decal Kit Tattered American Flag Reflective Black Mustang Ecoboost/ GT 2018-2022
Garage Friendly Name: Black Reflective Tattered Flag Hood Decal
Description:
Put some national pride on the hood of your all-American late model Mustang. This Anchor Room (18FM_TFH) Tattered American Flag Hood Vinyl Decal Kit will have the hood of your S550 GT or Ecoboost looking better than ever with premium cut vinyl rated for eight years outdoors and a variety of color options. Proudly made in the USA.

Features and Benefits:
- Choice of Several Vinyl Color Options
- Honors our Patriotism at its Finest
- Modern and Aggressive Styling
- Flows with Factory Hood Lines
- Computer Cut for a Perfect Fit
- High-Quality 8-Year Outdoor Vinyl
- Made in the USA

Kit Includes:
- Four (4) Tattered Flag Stripes
- Seven (7) Flag stars
- One (1) Installation Template

Vehicle Fitment:
- 2018-2022 EcoBoost Mustangs
- 2018-2022 GT Mustangs

*NOT designed for use with 2015+ Shelby GT350/GT350R or 2020+ Shelby GT500.

Please Note: Although this product can be an easy DIY installation with patience and the proper tools, we highly recommend that installation is completed by a professional. Tools that may be needed to successfully complete the installation of this item yourself are as follows: Application Fluid (See P/N: DAF) and a Spray Bottle, Squeegee, Microfiber Towel and possibly a Heat Gun. See P/N: DAK for a kit that can help you do-it-yourself.
Short Description: Anchor Room Reflective Black Tattered American Flag Hood Vinyl Decal Kit for 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 Ecoboost and GT Mustangs.

Product Name: Anchor Room Side Decal Kit Gloss Black Tattered American Flag Mustang 2015-2022
Garage Friendly Name: Gloss Black Tattered Flag Side Decals
Description:
Supporting our troops and showing your American pride in style is not the easiest thing to do. However, this new Anchor Room Tattered American Flag Side Decal Kit will show your pride and support in sporty style on your 2015-2022 Mustang wherever you go. This decal kit will accent both the driver and passenger sides of your pony with the stars and stripes.

Features and Benefits:
- Modern and aggressive styling
- Flows with factory body lines
- Manufactured from high-quality 8-year vinyl
- 6-piece kit is computer cut for perfect fitment
- Available in gloss or matte black
- Made in the USA

Kit Includes:
- Three driver side tattered American flag pieces
- Three Passenger Side Tattered American Flag Pieces (Stars facing forward)
- One Felt Tipped Squeegee
- Installation Instructions

Display your support for the troops and American pride all-day, every-day with this side decal kit!

Tech Tip: Although this installation can be handled at home with the correct tools and patience, we strongly recommend professional installation.
Short Description: Anchor Room Gloss Black Tattered American Flag Side Decal Kit for all 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 Mustangs.

Product Name: Anchor Room Roof Blackout Panel Vinyl Matte Black Mustang Fastback 2015-2022
Garage Friendly Name: Matte Blackout Roof Panel w/o Antenna Cutout
Description:
Protect the roof of your S550 for the next eight or more years with the Anchor Room Vinyl Matte Black Roof Blackout Panel 15FM_RBOP for 2015-2022 Fastback Mustangs. Made from premium quality vinyl, the matte black cut-out is the perfect addition to upgrade the exterior of your Mustang at a great price. 

This USA-made vinyl is computer cut to lay perfectly atop Fastback Mustangs as decal protection. Rather than deal with UV damage in the future, simply cover the rooftop with a matte black Anchor Room panel graphic that can be applied yourself or by a professional. Pick up a complete DIY application kit to make this weekend project fly by with accuracy. 

Features and Benefits:
- Matte Black Vinyl Graphic
- Die-Cut to Accommodate Roof
- Rated for at Least 8 Years of Outdoor Use
- Pre-Cut on a Computer Template
- Premium High-Quality Vinyl Decal
- Made in the USA

Additional Notes:
- Professional application is highly recommended. 
- DIY installation requires the following tools: application fluid (See P/N: DAF) and a spray bottle, squeegee, microfiber towel and possibly a heat gun. Or see P/N: DAK for a complete DIY kit.
- If your vehicle is equipped with a GPS or Satellite Radio Antenna on the roof, you will be required to trim this vinyl to fit.

*NOT designed for use with Convertible models.
Short Description: Anchor Room Vinyl Matte Black Roof Blackout Panel for 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, and 2022 Fastback Mustangs.

Product Name: Anchor Room Fender Stripes Kit 4-Piece 4" Vinyl Gloss Black 2005-2009
Description:
You've probably seen racing stripes on the side of a Mustang's fender and didn't realize how it easy it is! Customize your classic rod with the Anchor Room Vinyl 4-Piece 4" Fender Stripes Kit for 2005-2009 Mustangs. These stripes of an estimated eight-year outdoor use rating that will keep your pony's look fresh and clean.

Features and Benefits:
- Your Choice of Four Colors
- Fits 2005-2009 Mustangs 
- Computer Cut for a Perfect Fit
- High-Quality 8-Year Outdoor Vinyl
- Made in the USA

Color Choices:
- Gloss Black
- Gloss White
- Matte Black
- Matte White
- Silver
- Red

Choose among black, white, silver and red stripes here at CJ Pony Parts. These Anchor Room vinyl stripes lay seamlessly on the driver and passenger side fenders thanks to the computer-cut precise templates. Upgrading your S197 has never been easier until these thick four-inch racing stripes arrived!

Included:
- (2) Pieces for Driver Side
- (2) Pieces for Passenger Side

Additional Notes:
- Professional application is highly recommended; however, DIY application requires the following tools: application fluid (See P/N: DAF) and a spray bottle, squeegee, microfiber towel and possibly a heat gun.
- See P/N: DAK for a complete DIY kit.
Short Description: Anchor Room Gloss Black Vinyl 4-Piece 4" Fender Stripes Kit for 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, and 2009 Mustangs.

With a simple modification like this, or some of the other great choices available at CJ Pony Parts, you can have your 2005-2009 Mustang dropping jaws at the next car show!

- Seven Color Choices
- Patriotic, Tattered Flag Quality Graphic

Product Name: Baer Brakes Wheel Spacers 5 X 4-1/4"/ 4-1/2"/ 4-3/4" Steel 1/8" Thick Pair Universal
Description:
These Baer Brakes Universal Wheel Spacers (2000042) are essential when upgrading your vehicle to aftermarket wheels that differ in size from original dimensions. They are sold as a pair of spacers and feature a universal fitment that is constructed in the USA!

Features and Benefits:
- Sold as a pair
- 1/8-inch thick 5-lug spacers
- 5 x 4-1/4 inch, 5 x 4-1/2 inch, and 5 x 4-3/4 inch bolt patterns
- 0.531-inch stud holes
- 2.800-inch center bore
- 6-inch spacer OD
- CNC-machined steel
- Zinc-plated finish
- Universal fitment
- Made in the USA!

These Baer Brakes Wheel Spacers are constructed from 1/8-inch thick CNC-machined steel. They feature a 5-lug design and fit three (3) different bolt patterns: 5 x 4-1/4-inch, 5 x 4-1/2-inch, and 5 x 4-3/4-inch. They are made with 0.531-inch stud holes and 2.800-inch center bores, plus an OD of six (6) inches. To keep them durable and usable for years to come, each wheel spacer in this pair (2000042) is complete with a zinc-plated finish.

Tech Tip: Make sure you have enough thread engagement on your studs before adding spacers. In many cases, most cars cannot take more than 1/4-inch with stock studs, and this is not always the case. Please make sure you have the proper length studs to add the spacers and that your car can accept the amount of spacer you are looking to add. Please pay attention to fender clearance and tire rubbing.
Short Description: Pair of Baer Brakes Universal 1/8" Thick Steel 5 x 4-1/4" / 4-1/2"/ 4-3/4" Wheel Spacers.

Product Name: Baer Brakes Wheel Spacer 1/4” 5-Lug Pair Mustang 1965-2022
Description:
Wheel spacers are used for several different reasons. One of the reasons you would need wheel spacers is to change the offset of the wheels. These wheel spacers will help give your Mustang an aggressive look without breaking the bank. The wheel spacers from Baer Brakes will fit all 1965-2022 Mustangs with 5-Lug Wheels. Baer Brakes wheel spacers are available in different thicknesses providing the best fitment for your Mustang.

Features and Benefits:
- Manufactured from 6061-T6 billet aluminum
- CNC machining process virtually eliminates variations in thickness
- Ensures proper wheel torque is maintained
- Multiple bolt patterns (not elongated)
- Parallel finished to just .001 of an inch
- Universal 5-lug pattern to fit 5x4.25"/4.5"/4.75"

Please Note: The 1/2", 3/4" and 1" wheel spacers many need extended wheel studs installed making it possible to install the wheels on your Mustang.

These wheel spacers are manufactured out of a solid block of 6061-T6 billet aluminum. The CNC machining provides consistent thicknesses and is then parallel finished which means that the finished product is true on both sides. The tolerance of these wheel spacers is just .001" (one-thousandths of an inch).

Fine-tuning your track width doesn't just enhance your Mustangs looks, it also gives you improved handling performance and optimized roll characteristics. Wheel spacers give you the ability to position your wheels exactly where they will look and perform at their best. In many cases, installing the right Wheel Spacers can improve the look and function of your existing wheels.

Product Name: Wheel Spacer 5x4.20-4.75 .375 Thick Universal BAER Brakes
Description:
The Baer wheel spacer is a great tool to get a desired brake system to fit inside a wheel. The Baer wheel spacers are fully machined in-house from US sourced 6061-T6 billet aluminum to ensure they are flat and true to form. They are available in a wide variety of bolt patterns and sizes to ensure the perfect fitment for your application.
Details:

  • 3/8 Inch Wheel Spacers - 5 Lug
  • .375 Inch Thickness
  • Features 5 x 4.250 Inch, 5 x 4.500 Inch, And 5 x 4.750 Inch Wheel Bolt Patterns
  • 0.562 Inch Stud Holes
  • 2.800 Inch Center Bore
  • Total OD Of Spacer Is 6 Inches
  • CNC Machined From 6061-T6 Billet Aluminum
  • Bare Machined Finish
  • Sold In Pairs
  • Proudly Made In The USA

Note:

  • Make sure you have enough thread engagement on your studs before adding spacers. In many cases, most cars cannot take more than 1/4 inch with stock studs, and this is not always the case. Please make sure you have the proper length studs to add the spacers. Make sure your car can accept the amount of spacer you are looking to add! Pay attention to fender clearance and tire rubbing!
Short Description: Wheel Spacer 5x4.20-4.75 .375 Thick Universal BAER Brakes

Wheel spacers are used for several different reasons. One of the reasons you would need wheel spacers is to change the offset of the wheels. These wheel spacers will help give your Mustang an aggressive look without breaking the bank. The wheel spacers from Baer Brakes will fit all 1965-2022 Mustangs with 5-Lug Wheels. Baer Brakes wheel spacers are available in different thicknesses providing the best fitment for your Mustang.

Features and Benefits:
- Manufactured from 6061-T6 billet aluminum
- CNC machining process virtually eliminates variations in thickness
- Ensures proper wheel torque is maintained
- Multiple bolt patterns (not elongated)
- Parallel finished to just .001 of an inch
- Universal 5-lug pattern to fit 5x4.25"/4.5"/4.75"

Please Note: The 1/2", 3/4" and 1" wheel spacers many need extended wheel studs installed making it possible to install the wheels on your Mustang.

These wheel spacers are manufactured out of a solid block of 6061-T6 billet aluminum. The CNC machining provides consistent thicknesses and is then parallel finished which means that the finished product is true on both sides. The tolerance of these wheel spacers is just .001" (one-thousandths of an inch).

Fine-tuning your track width doesn't just enhance your Mustangs looks, it also gives you improved handling performance and optimized roll characteristics. Wheel spacers give you the ability to position your wheels exactly where they will look and perform at their best. In many cases, installing the right Wheel Spacers can improve the look and function of your existing wheels.

Product Name: BAER Brakes Wheel Spacer 5x4.20-4.75 .625" Thick Universal
Description:
For the perfect wheel fitment on your vehicle, sometimes a wheel spacer is in order. These Baer Brakes Wheel Spacers are machined out of durable aluminum for a perfect fit.

Features and Benefits:
- Get The Perfect Wheel Fitment
- Durable Materials
- Simple Installation
- Direct Fit Upgrade

The Baer wheel spacer is a great tool to get a desired brake system to fit inside a wheel. The Baer wheel spacers are fully machined in-house from US sourced 6061-T6 billet aluminum to ensure they are flat and true to form. They are available in a wide variety of bolt patterns and sizes to ensure the perfect fitment for your application.

Specifications:
- 5/8 Inch Wheel Spacers - 5 Lug
- .625 Inch Thickness
- Features 5 x 4.250 Inch, 5 x 4.500 Inch, And 5 x 4.750 Inch Wheel Bolt Patterns
- 0.562" Stud Holes
- 2.800" Center Bore
- Total OD Of Spacer Is 6 Inches
- CNC Machined From 6061-T6 Billet Aluminum
- Bare Machined Finish
- Sold In Pairs
- Proudly Made In The USA

Please Note: Make sure you have enough thread engagement on your studs before adding spacers. In many cases, most cars cannot take more than 1/4 inch with stock studs, and this is not always the case. Please make sure you have the proper length studs to add the spacers. Make sure your car can accept the amount of spacer you are looking to add! Pay attention to fender clearance and tire rubbing!
Short Description: BAER Brakes .625" Thick 5x4.20-4.75 Universal Wheel Spacer.

Product Name: Wheel Spacer Hub-Centric 1-1/2" Black Pair Bronco 2021-2022
Description:
Run the oversized pair of aftermarket tires you've been aching to get on your 2021-2022 Bronco without worrying about suspension and frame issues. A pair of Black 1-1/2" Hub-Centric Wheel Spacers pushes your wheels out by 1-1/2 inches to accommodate the wider tires for ample clearance. Bolt the spacers onto 6x5.5" bolt patterns with the pre-installed M12 x 1.5 studs. By switching to the 6061-T6 aluminum wheel spacers, you gain weight savings without sacrificing strength.

Features and Benefits:
- Spaces Wheel by 1-1/2" to Accommodate Wider Tires
- Hub-Centric Fitment to 6x5.5" Bolt Pattern
- Constructed of 6061-T6 Aluminum
- Corrosion-Resistant Black Finish
- M12 x 1.5 Studs are Pre-Installed
- Straightforward Installation

Please Note: These wheel spacers are only designed to work with the M12 x 1.5 thread pitch with a 6x5.5 bolt pattern found on the 21-22 Bronco. These spacers will not fit the Bronco Sport.
Short Description: Pair of Black 1-1/2" Hub-Centric Wheel Spacers for 2021-2022 Broncos.
